item.title: Testimonial
item.dc:creator: AlexLever017
item.content:encoded:
[et_pb_testimonial author="Judith Blackburn" company_name="Owner, Judith's Musical Services" portrait_url="https://baseonedigital.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/Testimonial-Image-2.jpg" quote_icon="off" quote_icon_color="#b5b5b5" quote_icon_background_color="#ffffff" _builder_version="4.8.2" body_font="OpenSans Regular||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" author_font="OpenSans Bold|700|||||||" company_font="OpenSans Regular||||||||" background_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.45)" custom_margin="|||" custom_padding="40px|30px|40px|30px|true|true" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px" border_color_all_portrait="#ffffff" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="50px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off" template_type="module"]

Alex has been a great support to me since we began. He has helped me get online to offer my music lessons to more people in the local area. I receive many enquiries per month from potential students, to the point where I'm now fully booked up most of the time! Fantastic job!

[/et_pb_testimonial]

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: AlexLever017
item.content:encoded:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.22"][et_pb_row admin_label="row" _builder_version="3.25" background_size="initial" background_position="top_left" background_repeat="repeat"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text admin_label="Text" _builder_version="3.27.4" background_size="initial" background_position="top_left" background_repeat="repeat"]

PRIVACY POLICY

Introduction BaseOne Digital respects the privacy of its website visitors, in particular their rights regarding the automatic processing of personal data. We have therefore formulated and implemented a policy on complete transparency with our customers regarding the processing of personal data, its purpose(s) and the possibilities to exercise your legal rights in the best possible way. If you require any additional information about the protection of personal data, please visit the website of the UK Data Protection Authority: https://ico.org.uk/. Until you accept the use of cookies and other tracking devices, we will not place any non-anonymised analytical cookies and / or tracking cookies on your computer, mobile phone or tablet. With the continued visit of this website you accept these terms of use and you accept the use of cookies and other tracking systems, unless we have provided for another method of accepting cookies on our website.

This currently available version of this privacy policy (September 2020) is the only version that applies while visiting our website until a new version replaces the current version.

Definitions

1. Website (hereinafter: “Website”) www.baseonedigital.co.uk

2. Party responsible for processing personal data (hereinafter: “the controller”): BaseOne Digital

Access to the website

Access to and use of the website are strictly personal. You will refrain from using the data and information of this website for your own commercial, political or advertising purposes, as well as for any commercial offers, in particular unsolicited electronic offers.

Website content

All brands, images, texts, comments, illustrations (animated) images, video images, sounds and all the technical applications that can be used to operate this website and more generally all the components used on this website, are protected by the laws on intellectual property. Any reproduction, repetition, use or modification, by any means whatsoever, of all or just part of it, including technical applications, without the prior written permission of the controller, is strictly prohibited. The fact that the controller may not take immediate action against any infringement, can not be considered as a tacit consent, nor of a waiver of any right to prosecute the infringing party.

Management of the website

For the purpose of proper management of the site, the controller may at any time:
• Suspend, interrupt, reduce or decline the access to the website for a particular category of visitors.
• Delete all information that may disrupt the functioning of the website or conflicts with national or international laws or is contrary to internet etiquette.
• Make the website temporarily unavailable in order to perform updates.

Responsibilities

1. The controller is not liable for any failure, disturbances, difficulties or interruptions in the functioning of the website, causing the (temporary) inaccessibility of the website or of any of its functionalities. You, yourself, are responsible for the way you seek connection to our website. You need to take all appropriate steps to protect your equipment and data against hazards such as virus attacks on the Internet. Furthermore, you are responsible for which websites you visit and what information you seek.

2. The controller is not liable for any legal proceedings taken against you: • because of the use of the website or services accessible via the Internet; • for violating the terms of this privacy policy.

3. The controller is not liable for any damages that incur to you or third parties or your equipment, as a result of your connection to or use of the website and you will refrain from any subsequent (legal) action against the controller. 4. If the controller is involved in a dispute because of your (ab)use of this website, he is entitled to (re)claim all subsequent damages from you.

Collection of data

1. Your personal data will be collected by BaseOne Digital and its data processors.

2. Personal data means any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person (‘data subject’).

3. An identifiable natural person is one who can be identified, directly or indirectly, in particular by reference to an identifier such as a name, an identification number, location data, an online identifier or to one or more factors specific to the physical, physiological, genetic, mental, economic, cultural or social identity of that natural person.

4. The personal data that is collected on the website is used by BaseOne Digital in order to maintain a (commercial) relationship with you and in order to carry out your application for our services. They are recorded in an electronic register.

Protection of data

Your data is protected by BaseOne Digital and its processors in pursuance to all legal requirements set by the GDPR and other relevant (UK) law. BaseOne Digital has taken technical and organizational security measures to protect your data, and requires its data processors to meet the same requirements. BaseOne Digital has signed processing agreements with its processors to ensure an adequate level of data protection.

Your rights regarding information

1. Pursuant to Article 13 paragraph 2 sub b GDPR each data subject has the right to information on and access to, and rectification, erasure and restriction of processing of his personal data, as well as the right to object to the processing and the right to data portability. You can exercise these rights by contacting us at alexlever17@gmail.com

2. Each request must be accompanied by a copy of a valid ID, on which you put your signature and state the address where we can contact you.

3. Within one month of the submitted request, you will receive an answer from us.

4. Depending on the complexity and the number of the requests this period may be extended to two months

Legal obligations

1. In case of infringement of any law or regulation, of which a visitor is suspected and for which the authorities require the personal data collected by the collector, they will be provided to them after an explicit and reasoned request of those authorities, after which these personal data do not fall anymore under the protection of the provisions of this Privacy Policy.

2. If any information is necessary in order to obtain access to certain features of the website, the controller will indicate the mandatory nature of this information when requesting these data.

Collected data and commercial offers

1. You may receive commercial offers from the BaseOne Digital. If you do not wish to receive them (anymore), please send us an email to the following address: alexlever17@gmail.com

2. Your personal data will not be used by our partners for commercial purposes.

3. If you encounter any personal data from other data subjects while visiting our website, you are to refrain from collection, any unauthorized use or any other act that constitutes an infringement of the privacy of the data subject(s) in question. The collector is not responsible in these circumstances.

Data retention

The collected data are used and retained for the duration determined by law

Imagery and products offered

You cannot derive any rights from the imagery that accompanies any offered product on our website.

Applicable law

These conditions are governed by UK law. The court in the district where the collector has its place of business has the sole jurisdiction if any dispute regarding these conditions may arise, save when a legal exception applies.

Contact

For questions about this privacy policy, product information or information about the website itself, please contact: alexlever17@gmail.com

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Who we are

Our website address is: https://box2300/cgi/addon_GT.cgi?s=GT::WP::Install::EIG+%28hoehillc%29+-+10.0.87.66+[WordPress%3b+/var/hp/common/lib/WordPress.pm%3b+294%3b+Hosting::gap_call].

What personal data we collect and why we collect it

Comments

When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Contact forms

Cookies

If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Analytics

Who we share your data with

How long we retain your data

If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

Your contact information

Additional information

How we protect your data

What data breach procedures we have in place

What third parties we receive data from

What automated decision making and/or profiling we do with user data

Industry regulatory disclosure requirements

item.title: Website Designer For A Small Business

Success Stories

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.8.2" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.8.2" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_testimonial author="Judith Blackburn" company_name="Owner, Judith's Musical Services" portrait_url="https://baseonedigital.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/Testimonial-Image-2.jpg" quote_icon="off" quote_icon_color="#b5b5b5" quote_icon_background_color="#ffffff" _builder_version="4.8.2" body_font="OpenSans Regular||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" author_font="OpenSans Bold|700|||||||" company_font="OpenSans Regular||||||||" background_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.45)" custom_margin="|||" custom_padding="40px|30px|40px|30px|true|true" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px" border_color_all_portrait="#ffffff" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="50px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

Alex has been a great support to me since we began. He has helped me get online to offer my music lessons to more people in the local area. I receive many enquiries per month from potential students, to the point where I'm now fully booked up most of the time! Fantastic job!

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.8.2" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_testimonial author="Jean Shaftoe" company_name="Owner, Books, Talks and Tours" portrait_url="https://baseonedigital.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/Portrait-Jean-241x300.jpg" quote_icon="off" quote_icon_color="#b5b5b5" quote_icon_background_color="#ffffff" _builder_version="4.8.2" body_font="OpenSans Regular||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" author_font="OpenSans Bold|700|||||||" company_font="OpenSans Regular||||||||" background_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.45)" custom_margin="|||" custom_padding="40px|30px|40px|30px|true|true" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px" border_color_all_portrait="#ffffff" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="50px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

Alex has created a fantastic site promoting my services (talks and guided tours) and merchandise which can be bought online. It is easy to operate and it looks very very attractive. My understanding of computers is limited so I also appreciated his patience and guidance.

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Projects" _builder_version="3.22" custom_padding="54px|0px|0|0px|false|false"][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.7.0" _module_preset="default" locked="off"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.7.0" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_divider show_divider="off" _builder_version="4.7.0" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.8.2" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="||||||||" header_2_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_2_font_size="35px" header_2_line_height="1.5em" header_3_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_3_font_size="35px" header_3_line_height="1.5em" header_4_font="Lato|700||on|||||" header_4_text_color="rgba(12,12,12,0.27)" header_4_font_size="14px" header_4_letter_spacing="3px" header_4_line_height="1.8em" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="30px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" header_3_font_size_tablet="" header_3_font_size_phone="25px" header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

Why Work With A Website Designer For Your Small Business?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.8.2" _module_preset="default" text_font="OpenSans Regular||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" text_orientation="center"]

By working with a website designer, you can boost the online presence of your small business and reach more of your customers. A professional website can act as your 'digital storefront', and gives you the opportunity to showcase the best of your work whilst providing your potential customers with a place to learn more about the products or services you offer.

I can design and develop a professional website tailored to your specific needs. With a wealth of experience in being a website designer for many small businesses around Nottingham, you can be sure that your website will align with your long term business goals and future growth aims. This gives you more reach, increased potential sales and  more control over your brand's image. What's not to love?

Featured Work

Books, Talks & Tours Website Design

I designed an attractive website for a small historical tours business located in Lincolnshire. The site was completed with a fully functioning online shop where users can purchase books, cards and mounted picture frames. Users can find out more information about the two historical figures and browse between a range of tour locations.

Why Work With BaseOne Digital?

- 1 to 1 Support - Web Design can be a jargon-filled maze sometimes. That's why I take the time to understand what your business's goals are and how we can both work together to meet them.

- Flexible - As a small business owner, your time is inevitably short, especially when you're balancing work with other aspects of your busy life. That's why it's more beneficial to work with a website designer that is flexible enough to work around your schedule.

- Honesty - We've all heard the old saying, 'honesty is the best policy'. It's a tried and tested mantra, and that doesn't stop with website designers Being transparent about pricing, information and knowledge is something I pride myself on.

- Affordable -  BaseOne Digital is slightly different from other website designers in Nottingham. It believes that a good website design doesn't need to cost the earth. By working to a budget that's right for you, I can develop a website to help expand your business's reach and get in front of your target audience.

Digital Marketing Services

Transparent Cost Information

The E-Commerce functionality is an extra £25/month.

The pay month packages require a minimum term of 12 months, after that it's a rolling monthly contract. After which, if you would like to cancel, you are welcome to transfer the website away if you need to. 

It's also worth noting that I don't charge you for consultations or communications.

Website maintenance and hosting costs can be covered by joining BaseOne Digital's monthly client retainer package for digital marketing services. From £200 per month, your small business can access the main suite of services to help grow your business online post website production.

Find out more about these services below.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.27.4" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" ul_font="||||||||" header_font="||||||||" header_2_font="Roboto|700|||||||" header_2_font_size="45px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" header_3_font="||||||||" text_orientation="center" max_width="800px" max_width_last_edited="off|desktop" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="|||" custom_padding="|||" header_2_font_size_tablet="35px" header_2_font_size_phone="28px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]

Frequently Asked Questions

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="3.25" locked="off"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_toggle title="How do digital marketing agencies work?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||5%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)"]

The main goal of a digital marketing agency is to manage the digital marketing requirements of your small business. This includes your website, social media accounts, PR and many more. 

Apart from website design, a digital marketing can help you promote your brand through social media adverts, Google search ads and monthly written articles/ blog posts.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="What times do you operate?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||5.1%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

My operating times are Monday to Sunday 9am - 9pm. However, these aren't strict opening times as we're happy to have meetings and consultations beyond that until later on in the night. I understand that small businesses owners have to focus on their business during the weekday 9-5.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="What is your process for handling clients" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||12%|" custom_margin_tablet="||0%||false|false" custom_margin_phone="" custom_margin_last_edited="on|desktop" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

1. To begin with, I'd have a 'discovery meeting' with you which would allow us to understand each others goals from the projects and identify your design preferences. From this, you'd receive a 'sitemap' to give you an overview of the page structure.

2. After this step, I'd come back to you with some initial designs using 'placeholder images and text' to give you a good idea and 'feel' of what the website will look like once it's completed.

3. From this, I'd work with you to write the text and source the images for the website. I'd then ask you to review the site whilst I conduct tests on the site for bugs and functionally amendments.

4. Once all the final changes are made to the website, and you're happy, we can sign off the website as complete. From this point onwards, I'd maintain and manage the site for you in exchange for the monthly package you have chosen.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_toggle title="What is your pricing structure?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||4.9%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)"]

Once you've decided on how big you would like your website to be, choose from one of the web design packages listed above.

The website is 100% yours, however, the monthly packages require a minimum term of 12 months. After this, you are free to transfer the website away if you need to.

You also have the option to pay upfront for the website, which isn't due until you're completely happy. With upfront payments, you get everything as you would with the pay monthly package, but only for the first 12 months.  After this period, there is a monthly retainer fee for hosting and maintenance.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="What makes BaseOne Digital different?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||5.1%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

BaseOne Digital isn't like other digital marketing agencies in Nottingham. I believe that a good website doesn't need to cost you the earth, instead, a high quality website can be achieved together with a reasonable budget.

What's more, l am available outside of the usual weekday 9-5 hours which means that if any issues occur during an awkward time, for example, during Friday night, you'll receive a quicker response than if you had to wait 2 whole days for the next working day. 

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="Will you manage my website for me?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||12%|" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

I can design, build and manage your site for you. Unlike other agencies, you'll continue to receive 1-to-1 support on your websites post build completion. You can rest assure that I will manage updates and deliver server maintenance to your website, so you can focus on growing your business. 

I also offer content creation services such as blog/ article writing and social media posts to keep your website fresh and up to date with the latest news from your industry. This way you'd be able to provide more value to your user and establish your brand as the 'thought leader' in your market. 

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Website Designer For A Small Business
Are you looking for a website designer for your small business? Located in Nottingham, BaseOne Digital designs professional websites.

Located in Nottingham, BaseOne Digital is a website designer which specialises in creating professional websites for small businesses. In addition to this, BaseOne Digital also offers various digital marketing services to help grow your brand.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: AlexLever017
item.content:encoded:
[et_pb_section admin_label="section"] [et_pb_row admin_label="row"] [et_pb_column type="4_4"][et_pb_text admin_label="Text"]

Who we are

Our website address is: https://baseonedigital.co.uk.

What personal data we collect and why we collect it

Comments

When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Contact forms

Cookies

If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Analytics

Who we share your data with

How long we retain your data

If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

Your contact information

Additional information

How we protect your data

What data breach procedures we have in place

What third parties we receive data from

What automated decision making and/or profiling we do with user data

Industry regulatory disclosure requirements

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section]

Are you looking for web design in Nottingham? I am your flexible local web designer with the experience and skillset suited to get your small business online. Whether you're looking for your first website to get your business up and running or a complete redesign of your current one, you've come to the right place.

Web Development Services

Specialised Website Design In Nottingham For Small Businesses

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_3,1_3,1_3" use_custom_gutter="on" gutter_width="2" _builder_version="4.6.6" background_color="#ffffff" width="57%" max_width="1440px" custom_padding="27px|0px|0|0px|false|false" use_custom_width="on" custom_width_px="1440px" locked="off"][et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_blurb title="Mobile Responsive" use_icon="on" font_icon="%%107%%" icon_color="#f767b4" use_circle="on" circle_color="rgba(247,103,180,0.3)" use_icon_font_size="on" _builder_version="4.7.0" header_font="Actor|700|||||||" header_font_size="18px" header_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_line_height="1.8em" background_color="#ffffff" text_orientation="center" module_alignment="left" custom_margin="||0px|" custom_padding="20px|20px|20px|20px|false|true" custom_padding_tablet="" custom_padding_phone="" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" animation_style="zoom" animation_intensity_zoom="8%" animation="off" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px" border_width_all_image="50px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)"]

Around 50% of global website traffic is from a mobile device. It's essential that your business is able to capture this market.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_blurb title="User-Friendly" use_icon="on" font_icon="%%257%%" icon_color="#76ce44" use_circle="on" circle_color="rgba(118,206,68,0.3)" use_icon_font_size="on" _builder_version="4.7.3" header_font="Actor|700|||||||" header_font_size="18px" header_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_line_height="1.8em" background_color="#ffffff" text_orientation="center" module_alignment="left" custom_margin="||0px|" custom_padding="20px|20px|20px|20px|false|true" custom_padding_tablet="" custom_padding_phone="" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" animation_style="zoom" animation_intensity_zoom="8%" animation="off" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px" border_width_all_image="50px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)"]

First impressions count. By prioritising usability throughout the whole website your business will present itself in the best way.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_blurb title="Future Proof" use_icon="on" font_icon="%%234%%" icon_color="#7a69e6" use_circle="on" circle_color="rgba(122,105,230,0.3)" use_icon_font_size="on" _builder_version="4.7.3" header_font="Roboto|700|||||||" header_font_size="18px" header_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_line_height="1.8em" background_color="#ffffff" text_orientation="center" module_alignment="left" custom_margin="||0px|" custom_padding="20px|20px|20px|20px|false|true" custom_padding_tablet="" custom_padding_phone="" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" animation_style="zoom" animation_intensity_zoom="8%" animation="off" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px" border_width_all_image="50px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)"]

Web design is constantly changing. Which is why every website should have the flexibility for additional features and systems.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.8.2" _module_preset="default" locked="off"][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.25" locked="off"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.8.2" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" ul_font="||||||||" header_font="||||||||" header_2_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_2_font_size="45px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" header_3_font="||||||||" text_orientation="center" max_width="800px" max_width_last_edited="off|desktop" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="|||" custom_margin_tablet="|115px||" custom_margin_phone="|-100px||" custom_margin_last_edited="off|desktop" custom_padding="|||" header_2_font_size_tablet="35px" header_2_font_size_phone="28px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]

Success Stories

Alex has been a great support to me since we began. He has helped me get online to offer my music lessons to more people in the local area. I receive many enquiries per month from potential students, to the point where I'm now fully booked up most of the time! Fantastic job!

Web Design Services

Why Does Your Small Business Need A Professional Web Design In Nottingham?

It's quite simple - it's where your customers are. Over the past 20 years we've seen the business world become more and more digital with everyday. It's often said in this competitive marketplace, 'if you're not online you don't exist'.

What used to be a 'nice to have' is now an essential part of any modern day successful business. Regardless of whether you're fashion boutique, a local plumber or anything else, having a website is the most effective way to let your customers know who you are and how to contact you.

Web Design Services

What Are The Benefits of A WordPress Website Design?

A Wordpress website enables you to retain full control of your site once it's completed. By using Wordpress's user-friendly interface, you have the option make small changes to the pages, images and blog posts as you choose. A website design and development company can help you to achieve this.

Wordpress is a content management system (CMS) which powers more than 35% of the websites around the world. Because of this, there is a vast amount of plugins/extensions that I can add to your website overtime so that it grows as your business expands. As a web designer in Nottingham, it's crucial to me that your website is adaptable and future-proofed.

Web Design services

A Web Design Agency Flexible To Your Needs

Just because your website is made in Wordpress it doesn't mean your website will be built using a 'one size fits all approach'. Based on your business's position and feedback from you, your website and platform will be customised to suit your needs.

Your business is unique, and so should your website be too. What you require from a website design is distinct from any other business. Which is why, as a web designer in Nottingham, I will work alongside you to ensure that your website design and development is tailor made just for you.

Why Work With BaseOne Digital?

- 1 to 1 Support - It can be overwhelming for a small business owner to approach the task of constructing a new website. That's why I'll take the time to understand what your business's goals are and how we can both work together to meet them.

- Flexible - As a small business owner your time is inevitably short, especially when you're balancing work with other aspects of your busy lives. That's why it's more beneficial to work with a web design agency in Nottingham that is flexible enough to work around your schedule.

- Honesty - We've all heard the old saying, 'honesty is the best policy'. It's a tried and tested mantra, and that doesn't stop with this web design agency in Nottingham. Being transparent being pricing, information and knowledge is something BaseOne Digital prides itself on.

- Affordable -  BaseOne Digital is slightly different to a typical web design agency in Nottingham. It believes that a good website doesn't need to cost the earth. By working to a budget that's right for you, we can develop a website to give your business an professional online presence.

Digital Marketing Services

Transparent Cost Information

The E-Commerce functionality is an extra £25/month.

The pay month packages require a minimum term of 12 months, after that it's a rolling monthly contract. After which, if you would like to cancel, you are welcome to transfer the website away if you need to. 

It's also worth noting that I don't charge you for consultations or communications.

Website maintenance and hosting costs can be covered by joining BaseOne Digital's monthly client retainer package for digital marketing services. From £200 per month, your small business can access the main suite of services to help grow your business online post website production.

Find out more about these services below.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.27.4" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" ul_font="||||||||" header_font="||||||||" header_2_font="Roboto|700|||||||" header_2_font_size="45px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" header_3_font="||||||||" text_orientation="center" max_width="800px" max_width_last_edited="off|desktop" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="|||" custom_padding="|||" header_2_font_size_tablet="35px" header_2_font_size_phone="28px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]

Frequently Asked Questions

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="3.25"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_toggle title="How do digital marketing agencies work?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||5%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)"]

The main goal of a digital marketing agency is to manage the digital marketing requirements of your small business. This includes your website, social media accounts, PR and many more. 

Apart from website design, a digital marketing can help you promote your brand through social media adverts, Google search ads and monthly written articles/ blog posts.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="What times do you operate?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||5.1%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

BaseOne Digital's operating times are Monday to Sunday 9am - 9pm. However, these aren't strict opening times as we're happy to have meetings and consultations beyond that until later on in the night. BaseOne Digital understands that small businesses owners have to focus on their business during the weekday 9-5.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="What is your process for handling clients?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||12%|" custom_margin_tablet="||0%||false|false" custom_margin_phone="||0%||false|false" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

1. To begin with, we'd have a 'discovery meeting' with you which would allow us to understand each others goals from the projects and identify your design preferences. From this, you'd receive a 'sitemap' to give you an overview of the page structure.

2. After this step, we'd come back to you with some initial designs using 'placeholder images and text' to give you a good idea and 'feel' of what the website will look like once it's completed.

3. From this, we'd work with you to write the text and source the images for the website. We'd then asked you to review the site whilst we conduct tests on the site for bugs and functionally amendments.

4. Once all the final changes are made to the website, and you're happy, we can sign off the website as complete. From this point onwards, we'll maintain and manage the site for you in exchange for the monthly package you have chosen.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_toggle title="What is your pricing structure?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||4.9%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)"]

Once you've decided on how big you would like your website to be, choose from one of the web design packages listed above.

The website is 100% yours, however, the monthly packages require a minimum term of 12 months. After this, you are free to transfer the website away if you need to.

You also have the option to pay upfront for the website, which isn't due until you're completely happy. With upfront payments, you get everything as you would with the pay monthly package, but only for the first 12 months.  After this period, there is a monthly retainer fee for hosting and maintenance.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="What makes BaseOne Digital different?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||5.1%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

BaseOne Digital isn't like other digital marketing agencies in Nottingham. We believe that a good website doesn't need to cost you the earth, instead, a high quality website can be achieved together with a reasonable budget.

What's more, BaseOne Digital is available outside of the usual weekday 9-5 hours which means that if any issues occur during an awkward time, for example, during Friday night, you'll receive a quicker response than if you had to wait 2 whole days for the next working day. 

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="Will you manage my website for me?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||12%|" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

BaseOne Digital can design, build and manage your site for you. Unlike other web design agencies, you'll continue to receive 1-to-1 support on your websites post build completion. You can rest assure that BaseOne Digital will manage updates and deliver server maintenance to your website, so you can focus on growing your business. 

BaseOne Digital also offers content creation services such as blog/ article writing and social media posts to keep your website fresh and up to date with the latest news from your industry. This way you'd be able to provide more value to your user and estbalsih your brand as the 'thought leader' in your market.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Web Design In Nottingham

Are you looking for web design in Nottingham? I am your flexible local web designer with the experience and skillset suited to get your small business online. Whether you’re looking for your first website to get your business up and running or a complete redesign of your current one, you’ve come to the right place.
 
Get in contactView price list
Web Development Services
Specialised Website Design In Nottingham For Small Businesses


Mobile Responsive

Around 50% of global website traffic is from a mobile device. It’s essential that your business is able to capture this market.


User-Friendly

First impressions count. By prioritising usability throughout the whole website your business will present itself in the best way.


Future Proof

Web design is constantly changing. Which is why every website should have the flexibility for additional features and systems.
Success Stories
Alex has been a great support to me since we began. He has helped me get online to offer my music lessons to more people in the local area. I receive many enquiries per month from potential students, to the point where I’m now fully booked up most of the time! Fantastic job!
Judith Blackburn

Owner, Judith's Musical Services

Alex has created a fantastic site promoting my services (talks and guided tours) and merchandise which can be bought online. It is easy to operate and it looks very very attractive. My understanding of computers is limited so I also appreciated his patience and guidance.
Jean Shaftoe

Owner, Books, Talks and Tours

Quick Contact Form
Interested in having a professional website made for your business? Just an email away.

Web Design Services
Why Does Your Small Business Need A Professional Web Design In Nottingham?
It’s quite simple – it’s where your customers are. Over the past 20 years we’ve seen the business world become more and more digital with everyday. It’s often said in this competitive marketplace, ‘if you’re not online you don’t exist’.
What used to be a ‘nice to have’ is now an essential part of any modern day successful business. Regardless of whether you’re fashion boutique, a local plumber or anything else, having a website is the most effective way to let your customers know who you are and how to contact you.
Web Design Services
What Are The Benefits of A WordPress Website Design?
A WordPress website enables you to retain full control of your site once it’s completed. By using WordPress’s user-friendly interface, you have the option make small changes to the pages, images and blog posts as you choose. A website design and development company can help you to achieve this.
Wordpress is a content management system (CMS) which powers more than 35% of the websites around the world. Because of this, there is a vast amount of plugins/extensions that I can add to your website overtime so that it grows as your business expands. As a web designer in Nottingham, it’s crucial to me that your website is adaptable and future-proofed.
Web Design Services
What Are The Benefits of A WordPress Web Design In Nottingham?
A WordPress website enables you to retain full control of your site once it’s compelted. By using WordPress’s user-freidnly interface, you have the option make small changes to the pages, images and blog posts as you choose. 
Wordpress is a content management system (CMS) which powers more than 35% of the websites around the world. Because of this, there is a vast amount of plugins/extensions that I can add to your website so that it grows as your business expands. As a web designer in Nottingham, it’s crucial to us that your website is adaptable and future-proofed.
Web Design services
A Web Design Agency Flexible To Your Needs
Just because your website is made in WordPress it doesn’t mean your website will be built using a ‘one size fits all approach’. Based on your business’s position and feedback from you, your website and platform will be customised to suit your needs.
Your business is unique, and so should your website be too. What you require from a website design is distinct from any other business. Which is why, as a web designer in Nottingham, I will work alongside you to ensure that your website design and development is tailor made just for you.
Why Work With BaseOne Digital?
– 1 to 1 Support – It can be overwhelming for a small business owner to approach the task of constructing a new website. That’s why I’ll take the time to understand what your business’s goals are and how we can both work together to meet them.
– Flexible – As a small business owner your time is inevitably short, especially when you’re balancing work with other aspects of your busy lives. That’s why it’s more beneficial to work with a web design agency in Nottingham that is flexible enough to work around your schedule.
– Honesty – We’ve all heard the old saying, ‘honesty is the best policy’. It’s a tried and tested mantra, and that doesn’t stop with this web design agency in Nottingham. Being transparent being pricing, information and knowledge is something BaseOne Digital prides itself on.
– Affordable –  BaseOne Digital is slightly different to a typical web design agency in Nottingham. It believes that a good website doesn’t need to cost the earth. By working to a budget that’s right for you, we can develop a website to give your business an professional online presence.
View Portfolio
Web Design Pricing
Web Development Cost

£395 Upfront
£35/Month
  • Up to 3 Pages
  • No Contracts & No Setup Fees
  • Domain & Yearly Hosting Included
  • Search Engine Optimised Web Text
  • Website Copywriting
  • Image Editing & Resizing
  • Post Launch Website Maintenance
  • 1 to 1 Flexible Support
  • Bespoke Website
  • Brand Development & Design

Digital Marketing Services
Transparent Cost Information
The E-Commerce functionality is an extra £25/month.
The pay month packages require a minimum term of 12 months, after that it’s a rolling monthly contract. After which, if you would like to cancel, you are welcome to transfer the website away if you need to. 
It’s also worth noting that I don’t charge you for consultations or communications.
Website maintenance and hosting costs can be covered by joining BaseOne Digital’s monthly client retainer package for digital marketing services. From £200 per month, your small business can access the main suite of services to help grow your business online post website production.
Find out more about these services below.
Digital Marketing Services
Learn More About Our Digital Marketing Services


Web Design & Development

Give your business an online presence with a professional website 


Search Engine Optimisation

Reach the top of the Google search rankings with SEO optimisation


Brand Design & Strategy

Establish and build your unique brand to build a loyal customer base


Copywriting & Strategy

Capture your customer’s attention with engaging content


Google Search Ads

Increase your website’s visibilioty in the Google Search rankings


Social Media Management

Reach more relevant customers with adverts on social media 
Frequently Asked Questions
How do digital marketing agencies work?
The main goal of a digital marketing agency is to manage the digital marketing requirements of your small business. This includes your website, social media accounts, PR and many more. 
Apart from website design, a digital marketing can help you promote your brand through social media adverts, Google search ads and monthly written articles/ blog posts.
What times do you operate?
BaseOne Digital’s operating times are Monday to Sunday 9am – 9pm. However, these aren’t strict opening times as we’re happy to have meetings and consultations beyond that until later on in the night. BaseOne Digital understands that small businesses owners have to focus on their business during the weekday 9-5.
What is your process for handling clients?
1. To begin with, we’d have a ‘discovery meeting’ with you which would allow us to understand each others goals from the projects and identify your design preferences. From this, you’d receive a ‘sitemap’ to give you an overview of the page structure.
2. After this step, we’d come back to you with some initial designs using ‘placeholder images and text’ to give you a good idea and ‘feel’ of what the website will look like once it’s completed.
3. From this, we’d work with you to write the text and source the images for the website. We’d then asked you to review the site whilst we conduct tests on the site for bugs and functionally amendments.
4. Once all the final changes are made to the website, and you’re happy, we can sign off the website as complete. From this point onwards, we’ll maintain and manage the site for you in exchange for the monthly package you have chosen.
What is your pricing structure?
Once you’ve decided on how big you would like your website to be, choose from one of the web design packages listed above.
The website is 100% yours, however, the monthly packages require a minimum term of 12 months. After this, you are free to transfer the website away if you need to.
You also have the option to pay upfront for the website, which isn’t due until you’re completely happy. With upfront payments, you get everything as you would with the pay monthly package, but only for the first 12 months.  After this period, there is a monthly retainer fee for hosting and maintenance.
What makes BaseOne Digital different?
BaseOne Digital isn’t like other digital marketing agencies in Nottingham. We believe that a good website doesn’t need to cost you the earth, instead, a high quality website can be achieved together with a reasonable budget.
What’s more, BaseOne Digital is available outside of the usual weekday 9-5 hours which means that if any issues occur during an awkward time, for example, during Friday night, you’ll receive a quicker response than if you had to wait 2 whole days for the next working day. 
Will you manage my website for me?
BaseOne Digital can design, build and manage your site for you. Unlike other web design agencies, you’ll continue to receive 1-to-1 support on your websites post build completion. You can rest assure that BaseOne Digital will manage updates and deliver server maintenance to your website, so you can focus on growing your business. 
BaseOne Digital also offers content creation services such as blog/ article writing and social media posts to keep your website fresh and up to date with the latest news from your industry. This way you’d be able to provide more value to your user and estbalsih your brand as the ‘thought leader’ in your market. 
Success Stories
Alex has been a great support to me since we began. He has helped me get online to offer my music lessons to more people in the local area. I receive many enquiries per month from potential students, to the point where I’m now fully booked up most of the time! Fantastic job!
Judith Blackburn

Owner, Judith's Musical Services

Ready to Start a Project?

Get in contact today
Get a Free QuoteView Portfolio
  • Follow
  • Follow
  • Follow
Are you looking for web design in Nottingham? We have the web development expertise suited for your small business. Get in contact today!

Located in Nottingham, BaseOne Digital is your flexible local web designer with the experience and skillset suited to get your small business online. Whether you’re looking for your first website to get your business up and running or a complete redesign of your current one, you’ve come to the right place.

The main goal of a digital marketing agency is to manage the digital marketing requirements of your small business. This includes your website, social media accounts, PR and many more. 

Apart from website design, a digital marketing can help you promote your brand through social media adverts, Google search ads and monthly written articles/ blog posts.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="What times do you operate?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||5.1%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

My operating times are Monday to Sunday 9am - 9pm. However, these aren't strict opening times as we're happy to have meetings and consultations beyond that until later on in the night. I understand that small businesses owners have to focus on their business during the weekday 9-5.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="What is your process for handling clients?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||12%|" custom_margin_tablet="||0%||false|false" custom_margin_phone="" custom_margin_last_edited="on|desktop" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

1. To begin with, I'd have a 'discovery meeting' with you which would allow us to understand each others goals from the projects and identify your design preferences. From this, you'd receive a 'sitemap' to give you an overview of the page structure.

2. After this step, I'd come back to you with some initial designs using 'placeholder images and text' to give you a good idea and 'feel' of what the website will look like once it's completed.

3. From this, I'd work with you to write the text and source the images for the website. I'd then ask you to review the site whilst I conduct tests on the site for bugs and functionally amendments.

4. Once all the final changes are made to the website, and you're happy, we can sign off the website as complete. From this point onwards, I'd maintain and manage the site for you in exchange for the monthly package you have chosen.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_toggle title="What is your pricing structure?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||4.9%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)"]

Once you've decided on how big you would like your website to be, choose from one of the web design packages listed above.

The website is 100% yours, however, the monthly packages require a minimum term of 12 months. After this, you are free to transfer the website away if you need to.

You also have the option to pay upfront for the website, which isn't due until you're completely happy. With upfront payments, you get everything as you would with the pay monthly package, but only for the first 12 months.  After this period, there is a monthly retainer fee for hosting and maintenance.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="What makes BaseOne Digital different?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||5.1%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

BaseOne Digital isn't like other digital marketing agencies in Nottingham. I believe that a good website doesn't need to cost you the earth, instead, a high quality website can be achieved together with a reasonable budget.

What's more, l am available outside of the usual weekday 9-5 hours which means that if any issues occur during an awkward time, for example, during Friday night, you'll receive a quicker response than if you had to wait 2 whole days for the next working day. 

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="Will you manage my website for me?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||12%|" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

I can design, build and manage your site for you. Unlike other agencies, you'll continue to receive 1-to-1 support on your websites post build completion. You can rest assure that I will manage updates and deliver server maintenance to your website, so you can focus on growing your business. 

I also offer content creation services such as blog/ article writing and social media posts to keep your website fresh and up to date with the latest news from your industry. This way you'd be able to provide more value to your user and establish your brand as the 'thought leader' in your market.

Need a Quote? Have a General Question? Get in Touch!

My opening hours are flexible to work around your busy work schedule. Given the time constraints placed on small business owners, I am happy to have meetings late into the evening – whichever time suits you!
 
View ServicesView Portfolio


Office Address

Stapleford,Nottingham


Contact

info@baseonedigital.co.uk078501 26063


Hours of Operation

M-F: 9am – 9:30pm S-S: 9am – 9:30pm 
Send a Message
Interested in driving growth? Have a general question? Just an email away.

GDPR Compliance

Frequently Asked Questions
How do digital marketing agencies work?
The main goal of a digital marketing agency is to manage the digital marketing requirements of your small business. This includes your website, social media accounts, PR and many more. 
Apart from website design, a digital marketing can help you promote your brand through social media adverts, Google search ads and monthly written articles/ blog posts.
What times do you operate?
My operating times are Monday to Sunday 9am – 9pm. However, these aren’t strict opening times as we’re happy to have meetings and consultations beyond that until later on in the night. I understand that small businesses owners have to focus on their business during the weekday 9-5.
What is your process for handling clients?
1. To begin with, I’d have a ‘discovery meeting’ with you which would allow us to understand each others goals from the projects and identify your design preferences. From this, you’d receive a ‘sitemap’ to give you an overview of the page structure.
2. After this step, I’d come back to you with some initial designs using ‘placeholder images and text’ to give you a good idea and ‘feel’ of what the website will look like once it’s completed.
3. From this, I’d work with you to write the text and source the images for the website. I’d then ask you to review the site whilst I conduct tests on the site for bugs and functionally amendments.
4. Once all the final changes are made to the website, and you’re happy, we can sign off the website as complete. From this point onwards, I’d maintain and manage the site for you in exchange for the monthly package you have chosen.
What is your pricing structure?
Once you’ve decided on how big you would like your website to be, choose from one of the web design packages listed above.
The website is 100% yours, however, the monthly packages require a minimum term of 12 months. After this, you are free to transfer the website away if you need to.
You also have the option to pay upfront for the website, which isn’t due until you’re completely happy. With upfront payments, you get everything as you would with the pay monthly package, but only for the first 12 months.  After this period, there is a monthly retainer fee for hosting and maintenance.
What makes BaseOne Digital different?
BaseOne Digital isn’t like other digital marketing agencies in Nottingham. I believe that a good website doesn’t need to cost you the earth, instead, a high quality website can be achieved together with a reasonable budget.
What’s more, l am available outside of the usual weekday 9-5 hours which means that if any issues occur during an awkward time, for example, during Friday night, you’ll receive a quicker response than if you had to wait 2 whole days for the next working day. 
Will you manage my website for me?
I can design, build and manage your site for you. Unlike other agencies, you’ll continue to receive 1-to-1 support on your websites post build completion. You can rest assure that I will manage updates and deliver server maintenance to your website, so you can focus on growing your business. 
I also offer content creation services such as blog/ article writing and social media posts to keep your website fresh and up to date with the latest news from your industry. This way you’d be able to provide more value to your user and establish your brand as the ‘thought leader’ in your market. 

Ready to Make Your Idea Come to Life?

Get in touch today!
Get a Free Quote

Select Your Digital Marketing Service

How Can I Help Your Small Business?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="4.6.6"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_blurb title="Website Development" url="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjU1MSJ9fQ==@" use_icon="on" font_icon="%%107%%" icon_color="#f767b4" icon_placement="left" content_max_width="1100px" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="64px" icon_font_size_tablet="" icon_font_size_phone="32px" icon_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" _builder_version="4.7.4" _dynamic_attributes="url" header_level="h3" header_font="Actor|700|||||||" header_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="15px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" text_orientation="center" module_alignment="left" custom_margin="||0px|" custom_padding="30px|20px|40px|20px|false|true" custom_padding_last_edited="off|desktop" animation="off" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="18px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" body_font_size_tablet="" body_font_size_phone="14px" body_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" border_radii="|10px|10px||" border_width_all_image="50px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

Do you need a new website? I can give your business a fresh online presence.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_toggle title="Learn More" _builder_version="4.6.6" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="15px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||12%|" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

Having a website for your business helps to build creditably with your customers as 84% believe that a business with a website is more credible than a one without.

This is because a website acts as your digital 'store front' allowing you to evidence all of the work you've done for other customers.

What's more, a website can give your customers a single place they can go for contact information, company updates and previous projects. Customers now expect small businesses to have a website regardless of the size, click through to see how I can help you. 

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_blurb title="Brand Design & Development" url="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjU5OCJ9fQ==@" use_icon="on" font_icon="%%276%%" icon_color="#7a69e6" icon_placement="left" content_max_width="1100px" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="64px" icon_font_size_tablet="" icon_font_size_phone="32px" icon_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" _builder_version="4.7.4" _dynamic_attributes="url" header_level="h3" header_font="Actor|700|||||||" header_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="15px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" text_orientation="center" module_alignment="left" custom_margin="||0px|" custom_padding="30px|20px|40px|20px|false|true" custom_padding_last_edited="off|desktop" animation="off" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="18px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" body_font_size_tablet="" body_font_size_phone="14px" body_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" border_radii="|10px|10px||" border_width_all_image="50px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)"]

Getting your branding right can help you to estbalish a long term relationsahip with your customers

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_toggle title="Learn More" _builder_version="4.6.6" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="15px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||12%|" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

All of the most powerful brands in history have done the same thing right; be recognisable.

Doing this can give your small business a competitive edge in the market as consumers will become more familiar with what you offer, thus building trust before leading to a purchase.

Overtime, this can enable you to form a foundation of loyal customers which is essential for scaling a small business. Click through to see how I can help your business.

Establish a 'tone of voice' through the copy on your website and marketing mateirals

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_toggle title="Learn More" _builder_version="4.6.6" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="15px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||12%|" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

Attention spans are short these days. This means that you've extremely short of time to grab the users interest, hold it and then guide them down the path of the 'customer journey'.

One way to achieve this to have concise, yet effective, copy on your website (main site and blog posts) and marketing materials (sales brochures, promotional emails and articles).

As digital marketing agency, BaseOne Digital has a lot of experience in copywriting for small businesses. Click through to see how I can help you.

Optimising your website's search ranking position on Google is a cost effective way to gain an advantage

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_toggle title="Learn More" _builder_version="4.6.6" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="15px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||12%|" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)"]

As we move towards a more digital age, it is becoming increasingly more important for businesses to have an online presence.

Gone are the days of picking up a chunky Yellow Pages directory and searching for a businesses alphabetically. Instead, the majority of consumers (89%) head to search engines to find a solution to their problem.

If your business isn't coming up high in these search ranking results, then you could be missing out on loads of website traffic and potential sales. Click through to see how I can help you.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_blurb title="Social Media Management" url="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjU5NCJ9fQ==@" use_icon="on" font_icon="%%259%%" icon_color="#fa5e5d" icon_placement="left" content_max_width="1100px" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="64px" icon_font_size_tablet="" icon_font_size_phone="32px" icon_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" _builder_version="4.7.4" _dynamic_attributes="url" header_level="h3" header_font="Actor|700|||||||" header_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="15px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" text_orientation="center" module_alignment="left" custom_margin="||0px|" custom_padding="30px|20px|40px|20px|false|true" custom_padding_last_edited="off|desktop" animation="off" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="18px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" body_font_size_tablet="" body_font_size_phone="14px" body_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" border_radii="|10px|10px||" border_width_all_image="50px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

Build more brand awareness and increase your customer base with social media platforms

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_toggle title="Learn More" _builder_version="4.6.6" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="15px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||12%|" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

As a small business, getting as much exposure as possible is essential to scaling in size.

Not only is this because it allows you to appear on their news feed by posting content, but it also facilitates a two way conversation with your customers so you can reach out to them and receive feedback at the same time.

Additionally, social media platforms offers an inexpensive way to reach a large amount of individuals in your target audience and promote products that they might be interested in. Click through to see how I can help your business.
