With Google Search Ads, your website can jump up to the top of the results pages.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_toggle title="Learn More" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="15px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||12%|" custom_margin_tablet="||5%||false|false" custom_margin_phone="" custom_margin_last_edited="on|tablet" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

Reports show that 76% of search queries go through Google, and 89% of consumers use search engines before making purchasing decisions.

This means that Google search is an essential part of the sales journey for many consumers, some of which could be your potential customers.

Google Search Ads can help your website to capture some of that traffic and see great returns on your investment. With high customisable campaign settings, you can target potential customers based on demographics, location and keywords they've entered.

Best of all, you can set your own budget. Click through to see how I can help your small business.

IDigital Marketing Services

How Are The Hours Used?

The management fees shown above covers the whole suite of BaseOne Digital's marketing services, and comes with the first month free as a revocable 'trial period'. The packages are available in 3 different tiers, with incremental access to more digital marketing services. The fee will pay for a certain amount of hours per month which can be allocated towards a wide variety of different marketing services. Together, we can decide on the best strategy to help your business expand online.

For example, if you wanted to focus on increasing your website's Google search engine rankings first then the majority of your available hours per month would go into SEO. Whereas, if you wanted to expand your reach on social media, your hours would be distributed into the creation of social media advertising campaigns. It's totally flexible towards your small business needs and goals.

To give you greater transparency, you'll receive a monthly report of the tasks that have been completed, along with the results from the previous month and the next steps for the following month. The retainer is charged on a monthly basis so you can cancel at anytime, I don't believe in getting tied down in long-drawn out contracts which means that the power is in your hands. Get in touch to see how I can help your business grow online.

Alex has created a fantastic site promoting my services (talks and guided tours) and merchandise which can be bought online. It is easy to operate and it looks very very attractive. My understanding of computers is limited so I also appreciated his patience and guidance.

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Digital Marketing Services Nottingham

BaseOne Digital offers a wide range of digital marketing services. These have been designed especially to help small businesses grow their brand’s online presence, and ultimately achieve more sales from their customers. 
 
Get a Free QuoteView Portfolio
Select Your Digital Marketing Service
How Can I Help Your Small Business?


Website Development

Do you need a new website? I can give your business a fresh online presence.
Learn More
Having a website for your business helps to build creditably with your customers as 84% believe that a business with a website is more credible than a one without.
This is because a website acts as your digital ‘store front’ allowing you to evidence all of the work you’ve done for other customers.
What’s more, a website can give your customers a single place they can go for contact information, company updates and previous projects. Customers now expect small businesses to have a website regardless of the size, click through to see how I can help you. 


Brand Design & Development

Getting your branding right can help you to estbalish a long term relationsahip with your customers
Learn More
All of the most powerful brands in history have done the same thing right; be recognisable.
Doing this can give your small business a competitive edge in the market as consumers will become more familiar with what you offer, thus building trust before leading to a purchase.
Overtime, this can enable you to form a foundation of loyal customers which is essential for scaling a small business. Click through to see how I can help your business.


Copywriting & Strategy

Establish a ‘tone of voice’ through the copy on your website and marketing mateirals
Learn More
Attention spans are short these days. This means that you’ve extremely short of time to grab the users interest, hold it and then guide them down the path of the ‘customer journey’.
One way to achieve this to have concise, yet effective, copy on your website (main site and blog posts) and marketing materials (sales brochures, promotional emails and articles).
As digital marketing agency, BaseOne Digital has a lot of experience in copywriting for small businesses. Click through to see how I can help you.


Search Engine Optimisation

Optimising your website’s search ranking position on Google is a cost effective way to gain an advantage
Learn More
As we move towards a more digital age, it is becoming increasingly more important for businesses to have an online presence.
Gone are the days of picking up a chunky Yellow Pages directory and searching for a businesses alphabetically. Instead, the majority of consumers (89%) head to search engines to find a solution to their problem.
If your business isn’t coming up high in these search ranking results, then you could be missing out on loads of website traffic and potential sales. Click through to see how I can help you.


Social Media Management

Build more brand awareness and increase your customer base with social media platforms
Learn More
As a small business, getting as much exposure as possible is essential to scaling in size.
Not only is this because it allows you to appear on their news feed by posting content, but it also facilitates a two way conversation with your customers so you can reach out to them and receive feedback at the same time.
Additionally, social media platforms offers an inexpensive way to reach a large amount of individuals in your target audience and promote products that they might be interested in. Click through to see how I can help your business.
U

Google Search Ads

With Google Search Ads, your website can jump up to the top of the results pages.
Learn More
Reports show that 76% of search queries go through Google, and 89% of consumers use search engines before making purchasing decisions.
This means that Google search is an essential part of the sales journey for many consumers, some of which could be your potential customers.
Google Search Ads can help your website to capture some of that traffic and see great returns on your investment. With high customisable campaign settings, you can target potential customers based on demographics, location and keywords they’ve entered.
Best of all, you can set your own budget. Click through to see how I can help your small business.
Get A Quote Using The Form Below.
Short on time? Head over to the contact page.

Which services do you require?

IDigital Marketing Services
How Are The Hours Used?
The management fees shown above covers the whole suite of BaseOne Digital’s marketing services, and comes with the first month free as a revocable ‘trial period’. The packages are available in 3 different tiers, with incremental access to more digital marketing services. The fee will pay for a certain amount of hours per month which can be allocated towards a wide variety of different marketing services. Together, we can decide on the best strategy to help your business expand online.
For example, if you wanted to focus on increasing your website’s Google search engine rankings first then the majority of your available hours per month would go into SEO. Whereas, if you wanted to expand your reach on social media, your hours would be distributed into the creation of social media advertising campaigns. It’s totally flexible towards your small business needs and goals.
To give you greater transparency, you’ll receive a monthly report of the tasks that have been completed, along with the results from the previous month and the next steps for the following month. The retainer is charged on a monthly basis so you can cancel at anytime, I don’t believe in getting tied down in long-drawn out contracts which means that the power is in your hands. Get in touch to see how I can help your business grow online.
Digital Marketing Services
Learn More About My Digital Marketing Services

Success Stories
Alex has been a great support to me since we began. He has helped me get online to offer my music lessons to more people in the local area. I receive many enquiries per month from potential students, to the point where I’m now fully booked up most of the time! Fantastic job!
Judith Blackburn

Owner, Judith's Musical Services

Alex has created a fantastic site promoting my services (talks and guided tours) and merchandise which can be bought online. It is easy to operate and it looks very very attractive. My understanding of computers is limited so I also appreciated his patience and guidance.
Jean Shaftoe

Owner, Books, Talks and Tours
We offer digital marketing services to help small businesses grow their online presence and achieve more sales from online customers.

BaseOne Digital designed an attractive website for a small historical tours business located in Lincolnshire. The site was completed with a fully functioning online shop where users can purchase books, cards and mounted picture frames. Users can find out more information about the two historical figures and browse between a range of tour locations.

Why Work With BaseOne Digital?

- 1 to 1 Support - Web Design can be a jargon filled maze sometimes. That's why I take the time to understand what your business's goals are and how we can both work together to meet them.

- Flexible - As a small business owner your time is inevitably short, especially when you're balancing work with other aspects of your busy life. That's why it's more beneficial to work with a web design agency that is flexible enough to work around your schedule.

- Honesty - We've all heard the old saying, 'honesty is the best policy'. It's a tried and tested mantra, and that doesn't stop with web design companies. Being transparent about pricing, information and knowledge is something I pride myself on.

- Affordable -  BaseOne Digital is slightly different to other web design agencies in Nottingham. It believes that a good website design doesn't need to cost the earth. By working to a budget that's right for you, we can develop a website to help expand your business's reach and get in front of your target audience.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Recent Projects

Located in Nottingham, BaseOne Digital provides web design and digital marketing services to small businesses. Below you’ll find a few recent projects, click through to find out more information about each one!
 
Featured Work
Books, Talks & Tours – Website Design
BaseOne Digital designed an attractive website for a small historical tours business located in Lincolnshire. The site was completed with a fully functioning online shop where users can purchase books, cards and mounted picture frames. Users can find out more information about the two historical figures and browse between a range of tour locations.


Live Website

View Full Project
Featured Work
Hair & Beauty By Leanne – Website Design 
A local hair dresser in Nottingham required a modern website to help drive enquiries for bookings. This has since helped Leanne to grow her mobile hairdressing into a reliable source of income. Complete with a high quality imagery, the mobile responsive site showcases some of Leanne’s best work to her potential clients.


Live Website

View Full Project
Featured Work
Hair & Beauty By Leanne – Website Design 
A local hair dresser in Nottingham required a modern website to help drive enquiries for bookings. This has since helped Leanne to grow her mobile hairdressing into a reliable source of income. Complete with a high quality imagery, the mobile responsive site showcases some of Leanne’s best work to her potential clients.


Live Website

View Full Project
Website Design
Dee Designs Ceramics – Website Design
Denise is a fiigurative hand-made ceramic artist based in Edinburgh, Scotland. The website has an online shop and a booking system to allow users to book onto her workshops.


Live Website

View Full Project
Website Design
The Lavender Pot – Website Design 
This small business nurtures and cares for a wide variety of lavenders. The site makes use of high quality imagery to showcase the natural beauty of these plants. 


*Currently under-construction

Website Design
The Lavender Pot – Website Design 
This small business nurtures and cares for a wide variety of lavenders. The site makes use of high quality imagery to showcase the natural beauty of these plants. 


*Currently under-construction

Featured Work
Judiths Musical Services – Website Design
Judith is a highly trained musical educator. Now retired, she offers piano lessons to students of all ages and experience levels around Nottingham. The website provides Judith with a way to reach more students and advertise her wide range of services, including musical theory and church organist. 


Live Website

View Full Project
Featured Work
Judiths Musical Services – Website Design
Judith is a highly trained musical educator. Now retired, she offers piano lessons to students of all ages and experience levels around Nottingham. The website provides Judith with a way to reach more students and advertise her wide range of services, including musical theory and church organist. 


Live Website

View Full Project
Why Work With BaseOne Digital?
– 1 to 1 Support – Web Design can be a jargon filled maze sometimes. That’s why I take the time to understand what your business’s goals are and how we can both work together to meet them.
– Flexible – As a small business owner your time is inevitably short, especially when you’re balancing work with other aspects of your busy life. That’s why it’s more beneficial to work with a web design agency that is flexible enough to work around your schedule.
– Honesty – We’ve all heard the old saying, ‘honesty is the best policy’. It’s a tried and tested mantra, and that doesn’t stop with web design companies. Being transparent about pricing, information and knowledge is something I pride myself on.
– Affordable –  BaseOne Digital is slightly different to other web design agencies in Nottingham. It believes that a good website design doesn’t need to cost the earth. By working to a budget that’s right for you, we can develop a website to help expand your business’s reach and get in front of your target audience.
View Portfolio
Success Stories
Alex has been a great support to me since we began. He has helped me get online to offer my music lessons to more people in the local area. I receive many enquiries per month from potential students, to the point where I’m now fully booked up most of the time! Fantastic job!
Judith Blackburn

Owner, Judith's Musical Services

BaseOne Digital is a small web design and digital marketing agency. With a focus on  providing digital marketing services to small businesses, BaseOne Digital is able to leverage years of experience to create professional websites.

 

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" admin_label="About" _builder_version="4.7.4" custom_padding_tablet="" custom_padding_phone="||0px||false|false"][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.6.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" ul_font="||||||||" ul_text_color="#000000" ul_line_height="2em" quote_font="||||||||" header_font="||||||||" header_2_font="Roboto|700|||||||" header_2_font_size="45px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" header_3_font="Lato|||on|||||" header_3_text_color="#c1c1c1" header_3_font_size="16px" header_3_letter_spacing="4px" header_3_line_height="1.6em" max_width_tablet="" max_width_phone="" max_width_last_edited="on|desktop" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="|||" custom_padding="|||" header_2_font_size_tablet="35px" header_2_font_size_phone="28px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" locked="off"]

Introduction

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="3_5,2_5" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" _builder_version="3.25" custom_margin="|||" custom_padding="3px|0|||false|false" custom_padding_tablet="|0vw||" custom_padding_phone=""][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.6.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="||||||||" header_3_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_3_font_size="35px" header_3_line_height="1.5em" header_4_font="Lato|700||on|||||" header_4_text_color="rgba(12,12,12,0.27)" header_4_font_size="13px" header_4_letter_spacing="3px" header_4_line_height="1.8em" hover_enabled="0" header_3_font_size_tablet="" header_3_font_size_phone="25px" header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off" sticky_enabled="0"]

Hi, I'm Alex. I've been designing websites for over 5+ years!

Born and raised in Nottingham, I studied business studies all the way through the education system and eventually graduated with a high 1st in BA, Business Studies from Nottingham Trent University. During that time I maintained a fond interest in marketing, particularly web design and digital marketing.

I've worked in the marketing sector since I was 16, undertaking roles in various companies to ultimately now setting up my own digital marketing agency in order to put my skills to the test. Since BaseOne Digital's commencement, I've worked with (and continue to work with) a wide range of small businesses from all over the country. Feel free to get in contact to see how I can help your small business.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_image src="https://baseonedigital.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/Me.jpg" title_text="Me" _builder_version="4.8.2" _module_preset="default" hover_enabled="0" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_vertical="0px" box_shadow_blur="23px" box_shadow_spread="13px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" sticky_enabled="0"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Overview" _builder_version="4.7.4" custom_margin_tablet="-5%||||false|false" custom_margin_phone="" custom_margin_last_edited="on|tablet"][et_pb_row column_structure="3_5,2_5" custom_padding_last_edited="off|desktop" _builder_version="3.25" custom_margin="|||" custom_padding="0|0px|0|0px|false|false" custom_padding_tablet="|0vw||"][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.27.4" text_font="||||||||" text_line_height="2em" header_font="||||||||" header_3_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_3_font_size="35px" header_3_line_height="1.5em" header_4_font="Lato|700||on|||||" header_4_text_color="rgba(12,12,12,0.27)" header_4_font_size="13px" header_4_letter_spacing="3px" header_4_line_height="1.8em" custom_margin="||-1px|||" header_3_font_size_tablet="" header_3_font_size_phone="25px" header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

My Vision

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.6.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="||||||||" header_3_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_3_font_size="35px" header_3_line_height="1.5em" header_4_font="Lato|700||on|||||" header_4_text_color="rgba(12,12,12,0.27)" header_4_font_size="13px" header_4_letter_spacing="3px" header_4_line_height="1.8em" header_3_font_size_tablet="" header_3_font_size_phone="25px" header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

Plain and simple, my vision is to help as many small businesses as possible get online and take advantage of the growth opportunities that the internet offers. It's said that 70% - 80% of people research a company before visiting or making a purchase. Therefore, it's absolutely essential that every single business has an online presence, regardless of their size. This includes having a website, a social media account and reaching out to customers that you might be missing out on.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.6.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.8em" header_font="||||||||" header_2_font="||||||||" header_3_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_3_font_size="26px" header_3_line_height="1.8em" header_4_font="||||||||" header_2_font_size_phone="25px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="off|desktop" locked="off"]

'Nothing is more expensive than a missed opportunity' - H. Jackson Brown

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.6.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" ul_font="||||||||" header_font="||||||||" header_2_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_2_font_size="35px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" header_3_font="||||||||" max_width="800px" max_width_last_edited="off|desktop" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="||-2px|||" custom_padding="||9px|||" header_2_font_size_tablet="35px" header_2_font_size_phone="28px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop"]

My Values

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider show_divider="off" disabled_on="off|on|on" _builder_version="4.7.4" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_toggle title="Integrity" _builder_version="4.6.6" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" border_color_all="#f7b100" border_width_left="10px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)"]

Too often in business, personal integrity is thrown by the wayside in an effort make a quick sale. I believe that harnessing healthy relationships is the key to mutual business success, therefore, all web design pricing, information and knowledge will be completely transparent throughout the whole process.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
About BaseOne Digital

BaseOne Digital is a small web design and digital marketing agency. With a focus on  providing digital marketing services to small businesses, BaseOne Digital is able to leverage years of experience to create professional websites.
 
Get a free quoteView Portfolio
Introduction
Hi, I’m Alex. I’ve been designing websites for over 5+ years!
Born and raised in Nottingham, I studied business studies all the way through the education system and eventually graduated with a high 1st in BA, Business Studies from Nottingham Trent University. During that time I maintained a fond interest in marketing, particularly web design and digital marketing.
I’ve worked in the marketing sector since I was 16, undertaking roles in various companies to ultimately now setting up my own digital marketing agency in order to put my skills to the test. Since BaseOne Digital’s commencement, I’ve worked with (and continue to work with) a wide range of small businesses from all over the country. Feel free to get in contact to see how I can help your small business.
My Vision
Plain and simple, my vision is to help as many small businesses as possible get online and take advantage of the growth opportunities that the internet offers. It’s said that 70% – 80% of people research a company before visiting or making a purchase. Therefore, it’s absolutely essential that every single business has an online presence, regardless of their size. This includes having a website, a social media account and reaching out to customers that you might be missing out on.
‘Nothing is more expensive than a missed opportunity’ – H. Jackson Brown
My Values
Integrity
Too often in business, personal integrity is thrown by the wayside in an effort make a quick sale. I believe that harnessing healthy relationships is the key to mutual business success, therefore, all web design pricing, information and knowledge will be completely transparent throughout the whole process.
Consistency
We’ve all experienced those businesses that work so hard to get your sale, but put you as a second place priority once the deal is past the line. Instead, I do things differently as my clients receive consistent 1-to-1 support and website maintenance no matter how long they’ve been a client.
Progression
Standing still in this fast paced digital world is a sure way to guarantee staleness, leading a decline overtime. To keep up with the market, it’s essential that all websites and digital marketing strategies are maintained and continuously improved with new features to provide real value to customers. I can help guide your business on this, get in touch today.
Previous Work
View Portfolio
Digital Marketing Services
Digital Marketing Services Available For Small Businesses


Web Design & Development

Give your business an online presence with a professional website 


Search Engine Optimisation

Reach the top of the Google search rankings with SEO optimisation


Brand Design & Strategy

Establish and build your unique brand to build a loyal customer base


Copywriting & Strategy

Capture your customer’s attention with engaging content


Google Search Ads

Increase your website’s visibilioty in the Google Search rankings


Social Media Management

Reach more relevant customers with adverts on social media 
View Services
Success Stories
Alex has been a great support to me since we began. He has helped me get online to offer my music lessons to more people in the local area. I receive many enquiries per month from potential students, to the point where I’m now fully booked up most of the time! Fantastic job!
Judith Blackburn

Owner, Judith's Musical Services

header_3_font_size_phone="25px" header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

Overview

Books, Talks and Tours is a small business ran by Jean Shaftoe. She primarily leads tour groups around various locations throughout Lincolnshire to educate them on key local historical figures from the Georgian Victorian times and the influence they've had on the area. In addition to this, Jean also sells multiple items including cards, notelets and books.

In order to attract more customers and expand her reach, Jean approached BaseOne Digital to help get her business online. The website now allows Jean to receive booking requests from all around the UK for her historical talks, and also now has her own side income earner through the online store.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" ul_font="||||||||" ul_text_color="#000000" ul_line_height="2em" quote_font="||||||||" header_font="||||||||" header_2_font="Roboto|700|||||||" header_2_font_size="45px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" header_3_font="Lato|||on|||||" header_3_text_color="#c1c1c1" header_3_font_size="16px" header_3_letter_spacing="4px" header_3_line_height="1.6em" max_width_tablet="" max_width_phone="" max_width_last_edited="on|desktop" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="|||" custom_margin_tablet="" custom_margin_phone="-12px||||false|false" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding="|||" header_2_font_size_tablet="35px" header_2_font_size_phone="28px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]

Deliverables

  • Multi-Page Website
  • Copywriting & On-page Search Optimisation
  • Imagery Advice and Resizing
  • Domain Registration and Hosting 
  • Mobile Responsive
  • Google Analytics Set Up & Integration
  • Online Store
  • Ongoing Support
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.25"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_image src="https://baseonedigital.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Books-and-Tours-Test.png" title_text="Books and Tours - Test" align="center" align_tablet="center" align_phone="" align_last_edited="on|desktop" _builder_version="4.6.6" width="100%" max_height="1000px" animation_style="zoom" animation_direction="bottom" animation_intensity_zoom="5%"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="About" _builder_version="3.22" background_color="#f5f6f9"][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.6.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="||||||||" header_3_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_3_font_size="35px" header_3_line_height="1.5em" header_4_font="Lato|700||on|||||" header_4_text_color="rgba(12,12,12,0.27)" header_4_font_size="16px" header_4_letter_spacing="3px" header_4_line_height="1.8em" header_3_font_size_tablet="" header_3_font_size_phone="25px" header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

Project Info

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="3.25"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.6.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="||||||||" header_3_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_3_font_size="35px" header_3_line_height="1.5em" header_4_font="Lato|700||on|||||" header_4_text_color="rgba(12,12,12,0.27)" header_4_font_size="13px" header_4_letter_spacing="3px" header_4_line_height="1.8em" header_3_font_size_tablet="" header_3_font_size_phone="25px" header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

Challenge

Due to the wide range of tours and available products the small business offers, it was important that extra attention was given to the layout of each page in order to prevent confusion to the user when navigating the site. What's more, Jean required the website to have an online store where users would browse multiple items and then safely make a purchase. This, therefore required an extra level of technical design to ensure that payments were securely made.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.6.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="||||||||" header_3_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_3_font_size="35px" header_3_line_height="1.5em" header_4_font="Lato|700||on|||||" header_4_text_color="rgba(12,12,12,0.27)" header_4_font_size="13px" header_4_letter_spacing="3px" header_4_line_height="1.8em" header_3_font_size_tablet="" header_3_font_size_phone="25px" header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

Solution

The various talks and tours were split out into separate pages to help deliver the content to the reader in an easily digestible way. Additionally, a user-friendly design was created by making use of the 'space' on the web pages which gave each element room to breathe and prevents the site from feeling cluttered. In regards to the online store, users can easily view a range of cards and before making a purchase using a secure gateway.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Books, Talks and Tours

Website Design
Visit website
Overview
Books, Talks and Tours is a small business ran by Jean Shaftoe. She primarily leads tour groups around various locations throughout Lincolnshire to educate them on key local historical figures from the Georgian Victorian times and the influence they’ve had on the area. In addition to this, Jean also sells multiple items including cards, notelets and books.
In order to attract more customers and expand her reach, Jean approached BaseOne Digital to help get her business online. The website now allows Jean to receive booking requests from all around the UK for her historical talks, and also now has her own side income earner through the online store.
Deliverables

Multi-Page Website
Copywriting & On-page Search Optimisation
Imagery Advice and Resizing
Domain Registration and Hosting 
Mobile Responsive
Google Analytics Set Up & Integration
Online Store
Ongoing Support

Project Info
Challenge
Due to the wide range of tours and available products the small business offers, it was important that extra attention was given to the layout of each page in order to prevent confusion to the user when navigating the site. What’s more, Jean required the website to have an online store where users would browse multiple items and then safely make a purchase. This, therefore required an extra level of technical design to ensure that payments were securely made.
Solution
The various talks and tours were split out into separate pages to help deliver the content to the reader in an easily digestible way. Additionally, a user-friendly design was created by making use of the ‘space’ on the web pages which gave each element room to breathe and prevents the site from feeling cluttered. In regards to the online store, users can easily view a range of cards and before making a purchase using a secure gateway.
Featured Pages
Books, Talks and Tours
Website Design
The site’s colour scheme of dark blue, white and gold gives it a professional and prestigious feel, which was one of the initial objectives given by the client. These colours were purposefully used to break up the page into different sections which indicates to the user when one part ends and another begins. This, in combination with the use of high quality images of the tour locations throughout the site give the user a taste of what they can expect to experience from visiting the area. Jean is extremely pleased with the site and I continue to be her go-to source for all digital marketing requirements.
Alex has created a fantastic site promoting my services (talks and guided tours) and merchandise which can be bought online. It is easy to operate and it looks very very attractive. My understanding of computers is limited so I also appreciated his patience and guidance.
Jean Shaftoe

Owner, Books, Talks and Tours

Overview

When Leanne wanted to take her hairdressing career to the next level, she approached me to build a highly quality website for her mobile salon business. Leanne was clear on her objectives for the website and in the process, she outlined the importance of ensuring that it had young/ fresh appearance to match her brand.

This meant that the website had to make use of bright colours to represent her salon brand as an approachable small business. The website has performed remarkably well and is still receiving numerous bookings per month. The website is now a staple in Leanne's strategy to grow the business over the next couple of years.

  • Multi-Page Website
  • Copywriting & On-page Search Optimisation
  • Attained All Client Goals
  • Domain Registration & Hosting 
  • Mobile Responsive
  • Google Analytics Set Up & Integration
  • Spam Filter On Contact Form
  • Ongoing Support
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.25"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_image src="https://baseonedigital.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Hair-Beauty-Backup.png" title_text="Hair & Beauty - Backup" force_fullwidth="on" align_tablet="center" align_phone="" align_last_edited="on|desktop" _builder_version="4.6.6" animation_style="zoom" animation_direction="bottom" animation_intensity_zoom="5%"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="About" _builder_version="3.22" background_color="#f5f6f9"][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.6.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="||||||||" header_3_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_3_font_size="35px" header_3_line_height="1.5em" header_4_font="Lato|700||on|||||" header_4_text_color="rgba(12,12,12,0.27)" header_4_font_size="16px" header_4_letter_spacing="3px" header_4_line_height="1.8em" header_3_font_size_tablet="" header_3_font_size_phone="25px" header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

Project Info

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="3.25"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.6.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="||||||||" header_3_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_3_font_size="35px" header_3_line_height="1.5em" header_4_font="Lato|700||on|||||" header_4_text_color="rgba(12,12,12,0.27)" header_4_font_size="13px" header_4_letter_spacing="3px" header_4_line_height="1.8em" header_3_font_size_tablet="" header_3_font_size_phone="25px" header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

Challenge

Leanne sought after a web designer who could bring all of her ideas together into one user-friendly design. This meant making use of youthful colours and high quality bold images to appeal to the her target demographic. In addition to this, it was also important to find a way to present Leanne's extensive price list in a way that is easily digestable to the user.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.6.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="||||||||" header_3_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_3_font_size="35px" header_3_line_height="1.5em" header_4_font="Lato|700||on|||||" header_4_text_color="rgba(12,12,12,0.27)" header_4_font_size="13px" header_4_letter_spacing="3px" header_4_line_height="1.8em" header_3_font_size_tablet="" header_3_font_size_phone="25px" header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

Solution

In order to achieve this design, I prioritised 'space' between the different sections. This allows the user to only be presented with one section at a time to read when scrolling down the page, therefore, making it less confusing. Additionally, this also benefits visitors using mobile phones due to their reduced screen size, which has lead to low bounce rates and more conversions.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Hair & Beauty By Leanne

Website Design
Visit website
Overview
When Leanne wanted to take her hairdressing career to the next level, she approached me to build a highly quality website for her mobile salon business. Leanne was clear on her objectives for the website and in the process, she outlined the importance of ensuring that it had young/ fresh appearance to match her brand.
This meant that the website had to make use of bright colours to represent her salon brand as an approachable small business. The website has performed remarkably well and is still receiving numerous bookings per month. The website is now a staple in Leanne’s strategy to grow the business over the next couple of years.
 
Deliverables

Multi-Page Website
Copywriting & On-page Search Optimisation
Attained All Client Goals
Domain Registration & Hosting 
Mobile Responsive
Google Analytics Set Up & Integration
Spam Filter On Contact Form
Ongoing Support

Project Info
Challenge
Leanne sought after a web designer who could bring all of her ideas together into one user-friendly design. This meant making use of youthful colours and high quality bold images to appeal to the her target demographic. In addition to this, it was also important to find a way to present Leanne’s extensive price list in a way that is easily digestable to the user.
Solution
In order to achieve this design, I prioritised ‘space’ between the different sections. This allows the user to only be presented with one section at a time to read when scrolling down the page, therefore, making it less confusing. Additionally, this also benefits visitors using mobile phones due to their reduced screen size, which has lead to low bounce rates and more conversions.
Website design
Hair & Beauty By Leanne
Website Design
The sections on the website are broken up through the use of alternating background colours. This works fantastically in delivering the page’s content in ‘bite-sized’ pieces as it signals to the reader when one section as ended and the other begins. In regards to the price list, it is clear for the user to find out what the various prices are due to the use of table. In addition, every page has a ‘call to action’ at the bottom which could be attributed to the high conversion rate. Overall, the user-friendly design makes the site incredibly easy to use for her visitors and is an inspiration for what small businesses can achieve with tight budgets.

header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

Overview

Spanning over multiple decades, Judith has had an illustrious music teaching career which has taken her around the world, and seen her inspire many of her students to achieve fantastic feats in the world of music. Now retired, Judith has continued to teach piano to students of all age groups and experience levels in her own house.

In order to attract more students and make the local people aware of her teaching piano classes, Judith decided that she needed a website with a fully functioning enquiry form for people to easily get in and book lessons. The result was a highly professional website which concisely delivers information about her teaching services, and receives regular enquiries from potential students.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.6.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" ul_font="||||||||" ul_text_color="#000000" ul_line_height="2em" quote_font="||||||||" header_font="||||||||" header_2_font="Roboto|700|||||||" header_2_font_size="45px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" header_3_font="Lato|||on|||||" header_3_text_color="#c1c1c1" header_3_font_size="16px" header_3_letter_spacing="4px" header_3_line_height="1.6em" max_width_tablet="" max_width_phone="" max_width_last_edited="on|desktop" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="|||" custom_padding="|||" header_2_font_size_tablet="35px" header_2_font_size_phone="28px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]

  • Multi-Page Website
  • Copywriting & On-page Search Optimisation
  • Imagery Advice and Resizing
  • Domain Registration and Hosting 
  • Mobile Responsive
  • Google Analytics Set Up & Integration
  • WordPress Training 
  • Ongoing Support
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.25"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_image src="https://baseonedigital.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Musical-Services-Backup.png" title_text="Musical Services - Backup" force_fullwidth="on" align_tablet="center" align_phone="" align_last_edited="on|desktop" _builder_version="4.6.6" animation_style="zoom" animation_direction="bottom" animation_intensity_zoom="5%"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="About" _builder_version="3.22" background_color="#f5f6f9"][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.6.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="||||||||" header_3_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_3_font_size="35px" header_3_line_height="1.5em" header_4_font="Lato|700||on|||||" header_4_text_color="rgba(12,12,12,0.27)" header_4_font_size="16px" header_4_letter_spacing="3px" header_4_line_height="1.8em" header_3_font_size_tablet="" header_3_font_size_phone="25px" header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

Project Info

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="3.25"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.6.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="||||||||" header_3_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_3_font_size="35px" header_3_line_height="1.5em" header_4_font="Lato|700||on|||||" header_4_text_color="rgba(12,12,12,0.27)" header_4_font_size="13px" header_4_letter_spacing="3px" header_4_line_height="1.8em" header_3_font_size_tablet="" header_3_font_size_phone="25px" header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

Challenge

Judith has a wide range of musical services that she can offer to students, therefore, the challenge was to identify the most relevant teachings and display them in an easily digestable way on the website. In addition to this, some of the images used date back to pre-1960 and so careful image edits were required for them to ensure a high quality and professional appearance.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.6.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="||||||||" header_3_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_3_font_size="35px" header_3_line_height="1.5em" header_4_font="Lato|700||on|||||" header_4_text_color="rgba(12,12,12,0.27)" header_4_font_size="13px" header_4_letter_spacing="3px" header_4_line_height="1.8em" header_3_font_size_tablet="" header_3_font_size_phone="25px" header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

Solution

I worked closely with Judith to establish the key services and how we could create the most effective layout on the page. Similar to her musical services, Judith's career experience is also expansive, and so I also worked with Judith to pick out a few highlights from her career which the user would find engaging. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="Projects" _builder_version="3.22" custom_padding="0|0px|0|0px|false|false"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" make_equal="on" padding_top_bottom_link_1="false" padding_top_bottom_link_2="true" _builder_version="3.25" custom_margin="-7px|auto|80px|auto|false|" custom_padding="0|0px|0|0px|true|false" animation_style="slide" animation_direction="left" animation_intensity_slide="1%" box_shadow_style="preset4" box_shadow_horizontal="780px" box_shadow_vertical="0px" box_shadow_color="#f5f6f9"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="80px||40px|" custom_padding_tablet="0px|||" custom_padding_phone="" custom_padding_last_edited="on|tablet" padding_tablet="0px|||" padding_last_edited="on|tablet" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.4" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="||||||||" header_3_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_3_font_size="35px" header_3_line_height="1.5em" header_4_font="Lato|700||on|||||" header_4_text_color="rgba(12,12,12,0.27)" header_4_font_size="16px" header_4_letter_spacing="3px" header_4_line_height="1.8em" custom_margin_tablet="40px||||false|false" custom_margin_phone="" custom_margin_last_edited="on|tablet" header_3_font_size_tablet="" header_3_font_size_phone="25px" header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop"]

Website design

Judith's Musical Services

Website Design

Judith's website is a 'one-page website'. This was chosen to help with reducing the time it takes for the web user to see the enquiry form once they land on the page. Additionally, the 'Book Lesson' button was also placed front and centre to encourage the user drop down to the form if they didn't have time to rest of the text. The result of this has been regular monthly enquiries for Judith's teachings, to the extent where Judith has to turn pupils away due maxed out lesson slots. She is extremly happy with the site, and suits her needs perfectly.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_testimonial author="Judith Blackburn" company_name="Owner, Judith's Musical Services" portrait_url="https://baseonedigital.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/Testimonial-Image-2.jpg" quote_icon="off" quote_icon_color="#b5b5b5" quote_icon_background_color="#ffffff" _builder_version="4.8.2" body_font="OpenSans Regular||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" author_font="OpenSans Bold|700|||||||" company_font="OpenSans Regular||||||||" background_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.45)" custom_margin="|||" custom_padding="40px|30px|40px|30px|true|true" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px" border_color_all_portrait="#ffffff" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="50px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

Alex has been a great support to me since we began. He has helped me get online to offer my music lessons to more people in the local area. I receive many enquiries per month from potential students, to the point where I'm now fully booked up most of the time! Fantastic job!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Judith's Musical Services

Website Design
Visit website
Overview
Spanning over multiple decades, Judith has had an illustrious music teaching career which has taken her around the world, and seen her inspire many of her students to achieve fantastic feats in the world of music. Now retired, Judith has continued to teach piano to students of all age groups and experience levels in her own house.
In order to attract more students and make the local people aware of her teaching piano classes, Judith decided that she needed a website with a fully functioning enquiry form for people to easily get in and book lessons. The result was a highly professional website which concisely delivers information about her teaching services, and receives regular enquiries from potential students.
Deliverables

Multi-Page Website
Copywriting & On-page Search Optimisation
Imagery Advice and Resizing
Domain Registration and Hosting 
Mobile Responsive
Google Analytics Set Up & Integration
WordPress Training 
Ongoing Support

Project Info
Challenge
Judith has a wide range of musical services that she can offer to students, therefore, the challenge was to identify the most relevant teachings and display them in an easily digestable way on the website. In addition to this, some of the images used date back to pre-1960 and so careful image edits were required for them to ensure a high quality and professional appearance.
Solution
I worked closely with Judith to establish the key services and how we could create the most effective layout on the page. Similar to her musical services, Judith’s career experience is also expansive, and so I also worked with Judith to pick out a few highlights from her career which the user would find engaging. 
Website design
Judith’s Musical Services
Website Design
Judith’s website is a ‘one-page website’. This was chosen to help with reducing the time it takes for the web user to see the enquiry form once they land on the page. Additionally, the ‘Book Lesson’ button was also placed front and centre to encourage the user drop down to the form if they didn’t have time to rest of the text. The result of this has been regular monthly enquiries for Judith’s teachings, to the extent where Judith has to turn pupils away due maxed out lesson slots. She is extremly happy with the site, and suits her needs perfectly.
Alex has been a great support to me since we began. He has helped me get online to offer my music lessons to more people in the local area. I receive many enquiries per month from potential students, to the point where I’m now fully booked up most of the time! Fantastic job!
Judith Blackburn

Owner, Judith's Musical Services

Ready to Start a Project?

Get a Free QuoteView Portfolio

Are you looking for a professional web design? I am your flexible local web designer with the experience and skillset suited to get your small business online. Whether you're looking for your first website to get your business up and running or a complete redesign of your current one, you've come to the right place.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_blurb title="Future Proof" use_icon="on" font_icon="%%234%%" icon_color="#7a69e6" use_circle="on" circle_color="rgba(122,105,230,0.3)" use_icon_font_size="on" _builder_version="4.7.3" header_font="Roboto|700|||||||" header_font_size="18px" header_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_line_height="1.8em" background_color="#ffffff" text_orientation="center" module_alignment="left" custom_margin="||0px|" custom_padding="20px|20px|20px|20px|false|true" custom_padding_tablet="" custom_padding_phone="" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" animation_style="zoom" animation_intensity_zoom="8%" animation="off" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px" border_width_all_image="50px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)"]

Web Design Services

Why Does Your Small Business Need A Professional Web Design In Nottingham?

It's quite simple - it's where your customers are. Over the past 20 years we've seen the business world become more and more digital with everyday. It's often said in this competitive marketplace, 'if you're not online you don't exist'.

What used to be a 'nice to have' is now an essential part of any modern day successful business. Regardless of whether you're fashion boutique, a local plumber or anything else, having a website is the most effective way to let your customers know who you are and how to contact you.

Web Design Services

What Are The Benefits of A WordPress Website Design?

A Wordpress website enables you to retain full control of your site once it's completed. By using Wordpress's user-friendly interface, you have the option make small changes to the pages, images and blog posts as you choose. A website design and development company can help you to achieve this.

Wordpress is a content management system (CMS) which powers more than 35% of the websites around the world. Because of this, there is a vast amount of plugins/extensions that I can add to your website overtime so that it grows as your business expands. As a web designer in Nottingham, it's crucial to me that your website is adaptable and future-proofed.

Web Design services

A Web Design Agency Flexible To Your Needs

Just because your website is made in Wordpress it doesn't mean your website will be built using a 'one size fits all approach'. Based on your business's position and feedback from you, your website and platform will be customised to suit your needs.

Your business is unique, and so should your website be too. What you require from a website design is distinct from any other business. Which is why, as a web designer in Nottingham, I will work alongside you to ensure that your website design and development is tailor made just for you.

Why Work With BaseOne Digital?

- 1 to 1 Support - It can be overwhelming for a small business owner to approach the task of constructing a new website. That's why I'll take the time to understand what your business's goals are and how we can both work together to meet them.

- Flexible - As a small business owner your time is inevitably short, especially when you're balancing work with other aspects of your busy lives. That's why it's more beneficial to work with a web design agency in Nottingham that is flexible enough to work around your schedule.

- Honesty - We've all heard the old saying, 'honesty is the best policy'. It's a tried and tested mantra, and that doesn't stop with this web design agency in Nottingham. Being transparent being pricing, information and knowledge is something BaseOne Digital prides itself on.

- Affordable -  BaseOne Digital is slightly different to a typical web design agency in Nottingham. It believes that a good website doesn't need to cost the earth. By working to a budget that's right for you, we can develop a website to give your business an professional online presence.

Digital Marketing Services

Transparent Cost Information

The E-Commerce functionality is an extra £25/month.

The pay month packages require a minimum term of 12 months, after that it's a rolling monthly contract. After which, if you would like to cancel, you are welcome to transfer the website away if you need to. However, I'd strongly recommend that we continue to work together in order to see the real long term benefits for your business.

It's also worth noting that I don't charge you for consultations or communications.

Website maintenance and hosting costs can be covered by joining BaseOne Digital's monthly client retainer package for digital marketing services. From £200 per month, your small business can access the main suite of services to help grow your business online post website production. The packages above are also available as a standalone retainer.

Find out more about these services below.

Frequently Asked Questions

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="3.25"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_toggle title="How do digital marketing agencies work?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||5%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)"]

The main goal of a digital marketing agency is to manage the digital marketing requirements of your small business. This includes your website, social media accounts, PR and many more. 

Apart from website design, a digital marketing can help you promote your brand through social media adverts, Google search ads and monthly written articles/ blog posts.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="What times do you operate?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||5.1%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

BaseOne Digital's operating times are Monday to Sunday 9am - 9pm. However, these aren't strict opening times as we're happy to have meetings and consultations beyond that until later on in the night. BaseOne Digital understands that small businesses owners have to focus on their business during the weekday 9-5.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="What is your process for handling clients?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||6.1%|||" custom_margin_tablet="||0%||false|false" custom_margin_phone="||0%||false|false" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

1. To begin with, we'd have a 'discovery meeting' with you which would allow us to understand each others goals from the projects and identify your design preferences. From this, you'd receive a 'sitemap' to give you an overview of the page structure.

2. After this step, we'd come back to you with some initial designs using 'placeholder images and text' to give you a good idea and 'feel' of what the website will look like once it's completed.

3. From this, we'd work with you to write the text and source the images for the website. We'd then asked you to review the site whilst we conduct tests on the site for bugs and functionally amendments.

4. Once all the final changes are made to the website, and you're happy, we can sign off the website as complete. From this point onwards, we'll maintain and manage the site for you in exchange for the monthly package you have chosen.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="Upfront vs pay monthly packages" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||6.1%|||" custom_margin_tablet="||0%||false|false" custom_margin_phone="||0%||false|false" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

With my pay monthly packages everything is included, this means the design, build, hosting, domain renewals and unlimited content changes are all included.

With pay upfront you get everything you do as the pay monthly packages but only for the first 12 months. After this period there will be a monthly retainer fee to cover web hosting and maintenance.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_toggle title="What is your pricing structure?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||4.9%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)"]

Once you've decided on how big you would like your website to be, choose from one of the web design packages listed above.

The website is 100% yours, however, the monthly packages require a minimum term of 12 months. After this, you are free to transfer the website away if you need to.

You also have the option to pay upfront for the website, which isn't due until you're completely happy. With upfront payments, you get everything as you would with the pay monthly package, but only for the first 12 months.  After this period, there is a monthly retainer fee for hosting and maintenance.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="What makes BaseOne Digital different?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||5.1%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

BaseOne Digital isn't like other digital marketing agencies in Nottingham. We believe that a good website doesn't need to cost you the earth, instead, a high quality website can be achieved together with a reasonable budget.

What's more, BaseOne Digital is available outside of the usual weekday 9-5 hours which means that if any issues occur during an awkward time, for example, during Friday night, you'll receive a quicker response than if you had to wait 2 whole days for the next working day. 

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="Will you manage my website for me?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||8.1%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

BaseOne Digital can design, build and manage your site for you. Unlike other web design agencies, you'll continue to receive 1-to-1 support on your websites post build completion. You can rest assure that BaseOne Digital will manage updates and deliver server maintenance to your website, so you can focus on growing your business. 

BaseOne Digital also offers content creation services such as blog/ article writing and social media posts to keep your website fresh and up to date with the latest news from your industry. This way you'd be able to provide more value to your user and estbalsih your brand as the 'thought leader' in your market. 

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="Am I tied into lengthy contracts?" _builder_version="4.8.2" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||8.1%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

My pay monthly website packages require a minimum term of 12 months. After this period it's a rolling monthly contract.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.25"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.27.4" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" ul_font="||||||||" header_font="||||||||" header_2_font="Roboto|700|||||||" header_2_font_size="45px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" header_3_font="||||||||" text_orientation="center" max_width="800px" max_width_last_edited="off|desktop" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="|||" custom_margin_tablet="|115px||" custom_margin_phone="|-100px||" custom_margin_last_edited="off|desktop" custom_padding="|||" header_2_font_size_tablet="35px" header_2_font_size_phone="28px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]

Success Stories

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row make_equal="on" padding_top_bottom_link_1="false" padding_top_bottom_link_2="true" _builder_version="4.7.6" custom_margin="|||" custom_padding="0|0px|0|0px|true|false" animation_style="slide" animation_direction="left" animation_intensity_slide="1%" box_shadow_style="preset4" box_shadow_horizontal="780px" box_shadow_vertical="0px" box_shadow_color="#f5f6f9" use_custom_width="on" custom_width_px="1440px" locked="off"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.7.6" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_testimonial author="Denise Brown" job_title="Owner" company_name="Dee Design Ceramics" portrait_url="https://baseonedigital.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Testimonial-Image.jpg" quote_icon="off" quote_icon_color="#b5b5b5" quote_icon_background_color="#ffffff" _builder_version="4.8.2" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||44px|||" custom_padding="40px|30px|40px|30px|true|true" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px" border_color_all_portrait="#ffffff" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)"]

I am very pleased with Alex's work building me a website from start to finish. I found Alex to be very personable and was very supportive and patient in guiding me through all my technical challenges. Alex worked well collaboratively and kept me in the loop at every stage.

Alex was very responsive and professional in attitude throughout the process. He has a mature approach and challenges were met head-on. No task or roadblock seemed to have phased him, and he remained committed to the work in hand. I would recommend Alex to anyone looking to get a professional website up and running.

Thank you Alex! I can't wait to use my beautiful website now

[/et_pb_testimonial][et_pb_divider show_divider="off" _builder_version="4.8.2" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="3_5,2_5" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" _builder_version="3.25" custom_margin="|||" custom_padding="3px|0|||false|false" custom_padding_tablet="|0vw||" custom_padding_phone="" locked="off"][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.6.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="||||||||" header_3_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_3_font_size="35px" header_3_line_height="1.5em" header_4_font="Lato|700||on|||||" header_4_text_color="rgba(12,12,12,0.27)" header_4_font_size="13px" header_4_letter_spacing="3px" header_4_line_height="1.8em" header_3_font_size_tablet="" header_3_font_size_phone="25px" header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

Hi, I'm Alex. I've been designing websites for over 5+ years!

Born and raised in Nottingham, I studied business studies all the way through the education system and eventually graduated with a high 1st in BA, Business Studies from Nottingham Trent University. During that time I maintained a fond interest in marketing, particularly web design and digital marketing.

I've worked in the marketing sector since I was 16, undertaking roles in various companies to ultimately now setting up my own digital marketing agency in order to put my skills to the test. Since BaseOne Digital's commencement, I've worked with (and continue to work with) a wide range of small businesses from all over the country. Feel free to get in contact to see how I can help your small business.
