Frequently Asked Questions

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="3.25"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_toggle title="What times do you operate?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||5.1%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

BaseOne Digital's operating times are Monday to Sunday 9am - 9pm. However, these aren't strict opening times as we're happy to have meetings and consultations beyond that until later on in the night. BaseOne Digital understands that small businesses owners have to focus on their business during the weekday 9-5.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="What is your process for handling clients?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||6.1%|||" custom_margin_tablet="||0%||false|false" custom_margin_phone="||0%||false|false" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

1. To begin with, we'd have a 'discovery meeting' with you which would allow us to understand each others goals from the projects and identify your design preferences. From this, you'd receive a 'sitemap' to give you an overview of the page structure.

2. After this step, we'd come back to you with some initial designs using 'placeholder images and text' to give you a good idea and 'feel' of what the website will look like once it's completed.

3. From this, we'd work with you to write the text and source the images for the website. We'd then asked you to review the site whilst we conduct tests on the site for bugs and functionally amendments.

4. Once all the final changes are made to the website, and you're happy, we can sign off the website as complete. From this point onwards, we'll maintain and manage the site for you in exchange for the monthly package you have chosen.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_toggle title="What makes BaseOne Digital different?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||5.1%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

BaseOne Digital isn't like other digital marketing agencies in Nottingham. We believe that a good website doesn't need to cost you the earth, instead, a high quality website can be achieved together with a reasonable budget.

What's more, BaseOne Digital is available outside of the usual weekday 9-5 hours which means that if any issues occur during an awkward time, for example, during Friday night, you'll receive a quicker response than if you had to wait 2 whole days for the next working day. 

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="Will you manage my website for me?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||8.1%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

BaseOne Digital can design, build and manage your site for you. Unlike other web design agencies, you'll continue to receive 1-to-1 support on your websites post build completion. You can rest assure that BaseOne Digital will manage updates and deliver server maintenance to your website, so you can focus on growing your business. 

BaseOne Digital also offers content creation services such as blog/ article writing and social media posts to keep your website fresh and up to date with the latest news from your industry. This way you'd be able to provide more value to your user and estbalsih your brand as the 'thought leader' in your market. 

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.25"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.27.4" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" ul_font="||||||||" header_font="||||||||" header_2_font="Roboto|700|||||||" header_2_font_size="45px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" header_3_font="||||||||" text_orientation="center" max_width="800px" max_width_last_edited="off|desktop" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="|||" custom_margin_tablet="|115px||" custom_margin_phone="|-100px||" custom_margin_last_edited="off|desktop" custom_padding="|||" header_2_font_size_tablet="35px" header_2_font_size_phone="28px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]

Success Stories

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row make_equal="on" padding_top_bottom_link_1="false" padding_top_bottom_link_2="true" _builder_version="4.7.6" custom_margin="|||" custom_padding="0|0px|0|0px|true|false" animation_style="slide" animation_direction="left" animation_intensity_slide="1%" box_shadow_style="preset4" box_shadow_horizontal="780px" box_shadow_vertical="0px" box_shadow_color="#f5f6f9" use_custom_width="on" custom_width_px="1440px" locked="off"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.7.6" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_testimonial author="Denise Brown" job_title="Owner" company_name="Dee Design Ceramics" portrait_url="https://baseonedigital.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Testimonial-Image.jpg" quote_icon="off" quote_icon_color="#b5b5b5" quote_icon_background_color="#ffffff" _builder_version="4.8.2" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||44px|||" custom_padding="40px|30px|40px|30px|true|true" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px" border_color_all_portrait="#ffffff" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)"]

I am very pleased with Alex's work building me a website from start to finish. I found Alex to be very personable and was very supportive and patient in guiding me through all my technical challenges. Alex worked well collaboratively and kept me in the loop at every stage.

Alex was very responsive and professional in attitude throughout the process. He has a mature approach and challenges were met head-on. No task or roadblock seemed to have phased him, and he remained committed to the work in hand. I would recommend Alex to anyone looking to get a professional website up and running.

Thank you Alex! I can't wait to use my beautiful website now

[/et_pb_testimonial][et_pb_divider show_divider="off" _builder_version="4.8.2" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="3_5,2_5" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" _builder_version="3.25" custom_margin="|||" custom_padding="3px|0|||false|false" custom_padding_tablet="|0vw||" custom_padding_phone="" locked="off"][et_pb_column type="3_5" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.6.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="||||||||" header_3_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_3_font_size="35px" header_3_line_height="1.5em" header_4_font="Lato|700||on|||||" header_4_text_color="rgba(12,12,12,0.27)" header_4_font_size="13px" header_4_letter_spacing="3px" header_4_line_height="1.8em" header_3_font_size_tablet="" header_3_font_size_phone="25px" header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

Hi, I'm Alex. I've been designing websites for over 5+ years!

Born and raised in Nottingham, I studied business studies all the way through the education system and eventually graduated with a high 1st in BA, Business Studies from Nottingham Trent University. During that time I maintained a fond interest in marketing, particularly web design and digital marketing.

I've worked in the marketing sector since I was 16, undertaking roles in various companies to ultimately now setting up my own digital marketing agency in order to put my skills to the test. Since BaseOne Digital's commencement, I've worked with (and continue to work with) a wide range of small businesses from all over the country. Feel free to get in contact to see how I can help your small business.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Are you looking for web design in Nottingham? We have the web development expertise suited for your small business. Get in contact today!

Located in Nottingham, BaseOne Digital is your flexible local web designer with the experience and skillset suited to get your small business online. Whether you’re looking for your first website to get your business up and running or a complete redesign of your current one, you’ve come to the right place.

item.dc:creator: AlexLever017

What Is SEO?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.0" _module_preset="default" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" text_orientation="center"]

Search Engine Optimisation (SEO) is the process of improving a webpage through the use of relevant keywords and other technical improvements in order for it to appear higher in search engine result rankings. This will increase the chance of more people clicking on the site's link, therefore, dirivng more traffic to your website.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.6.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="||||||||" header_3_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_3_font_size="35px" header_3_line_height="1.5em" header_4_font="Lato|700||on|||||" header_4_text_color="rgba(12,12,12,0.27)" header_4_font_size="16px" header_4_letter_spacing="3px" header_4_line_height="1.8em" header_3_font_size_tablet="" header_3_font_size_phone="25px" header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

SEO Services Benefits

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_tabs module_class="equal-tabs" _builder_version="4.7.3" _module_preset="default" body_font_size="16px" tab_font="Actor|700|||||||" tab_font_size="18px" module_alignment="left" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)"][et_pb_tab title="Increase Conversion Rates " _builder_version="4.7.3" _module_preset="default"]

Primarily, your website's purpose is to either drive sales or raise awareness of the services you provide. An SEO-optimised website will provide a better experience to your users as it'll load faster, be more responsive to their device and provide relevant information for their search query.

These websites are more likely to retain their user's attention and build that trust overtime, so they're more likely to take action on your website such as making a purchase or getting in touch.

[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title="Drive More Traffic" _builder_version="4.7.3" _module_preset="default"]

Your website needs visitors, without no-one is going to convert. If your website ticking all of the right hypothetical SEO boxes, it's much more likely to be preferred by search engines which means that it'll rank it higher for popular search terms more often.

Whatsmore, if you optimse your content for niche keywords in your market, you'll be able to recieve more relevant traffic of whom are more likely to take action on your website.

[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title="Build Brand Awareness" _builder_version="4.7.3" _module_preset="default"]

SEO is particularly important to small businesses as it gives your brand access to an inexpensive way to increase awareness. If your site is optimsed, you'll be more likely to come up when local customers are conducting a search. The more times your brand pops up in the results page, the more familiar your potential customers will become with your brand.

Even if the user doesn't visit your site right there and then, they're more likely to consider you in the future due to the increased familiarity.

[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title="Cost Effective Marketing" _builder_version="4.7.3" _module_preset="default"]

Smaller businesses can use SEO as a way to bypass their competition, even if they've got a smaller marketing budget. While the bigger competition might be able to spends loads of money on 'pay per click' ads and other forms, with a solid SEO strategy your business will be able to match these companies in the results rankings, and even go beyond them.

This is because SEO isn't a numbers game, it's about who can identify and exploit the profitable niches in the best way. Additionally, SEO is a better stratgey in the long run than paying for loads of ads space, as once you stop spending on them they stop, whereas SEO is long lasting and stay around the top of the search results for as long as your competitors don't outrank you.

[/et_pb_tab][/et_pb_tabs][et_pb_divider show_divider="off" _builder_version="4.7.0" _module_preset="default"][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="2_5,3_5" make_equal="on" padding_top_bottom_link_1="false" padding_top_bottom_link_2="true" module_id="technical" _builder_version="4.7.6" custom_margin="40px||80px||false" custom_margin_tablet="" custom_margin_phone="0px||80px||false|false" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding="0|0px|0|0px|true|false" animation_style="slide" animation_direction="left" animation_intensity_slide="1%" box_shadow_style="preset4" box_shadow_horizontal="780px" box_shadow_vertical="0px" box_shadow_color="#f5f6f9"][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="80px||40px|" custom_padding_tablet="0px|||" custom_padding_phone="" custom_padding_last_edited="on|tablet" padding_tablet="0px|||" padding_last_edited="on|tablet" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.7" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="||||||||" header_2_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_2_font_size="35px" header_2_line_height="1.5em" header_3_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_3_font_size="35px" header_3_line_height="1.5em" header_4_font="Lato|700||on|||||" header_4_text_color="rgba(12,12,12,0.27)" header_4_font_size="14px" header_4_letter_spacing="3px" header_4_line_height="1.8em" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="30px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" header_3_font_size_tablet="" header_3_font_size_phone="25px" header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop"]

SEO Services

What Are Technical SEO Issues?

Having a nice looking website without a solid SEO technical foundation is like having a sports car with a broken chassis - it won't work properly. It's imperative that your website has sound SEO fundamentals otherwise Google simply won't rank it highly.

Technical SEO issues can include broken links, incorrect URLs, search engine crawling problems and many more. By conducting a step-by-step technical review, I can help to resolve these issues and increase the search ranking for your website.

SEO Services

How To Optimise Content On Your Website?

The trick is to provide an answer to the questions your customers are searching for and then demonstrate this to Google. By focusing the content on your pages around commonly searched topics, you can tell Google that your business is the best option to resolve the 'searchers' query.

Search engines prefer the content (text & images) on websites to be structured appropriately in order for their 'bots' to 'crawl' and understand the purpose of your pages better. By using the right keywords in the right way your website can climb the search rankings and increase the overall inbound traffic.

SEO Services

What Is Link Building In SEO?

Google's 'PageRank' algorithm lists websites in an order of priority based on the number of quality links that a website receives across its pages. When a link is given to a website, the sender passes some of its PageRank across. The impact of this will depend on the link sender's domain authority. 

As part of my SEO services, I can help your website to build high quality 'backlinks' to improve your search rankings. Alongside this, your business can also benefit from up to date search engine optimisation consultancy.

SEO Services

Analytical Search Engine Optimisation Reports

I have a wide of our search engine optmisation services available. Due to the analytical nature of SEO it can often benefit business owners to be given an 'easy to interpret' report demonstrating the improvements in their website's search engine results.

 The report will provide up to date analysis on a multitude of website data points, such as demographics, behaviour flows and link sources. As your local SEO agency, this tailored report can be fully customised to showcase data which is important to you and your business.

Why Work With BaseOne Digital?

- 1 to 1 Support - SEO can be a jargon filled maze sometimes. That's why I take the time to understand what your business's goals are and how we can both work together to meet them.

- Flexible - As a small business owner your time is inevitably short, especially when you're balancing work with other aspects of your busy life. That's why it's more beneficial to work with an agency that is flexible enough to work around your schedule.

- Honesty - We've all heard the old saying, 'honesty is the best policy'. It's a tried and tested mantra, and that doesn't stop with SEO companies. Being transparent about pricing, information and knowledge is something I pride myself on.

- Affordable -  BaseOne Digital is slightly different to other SEO agencies in Nottingham. It believes that a good SEO strategy doesn't need to cost the earth. By working to a budget that's right for you, we can develop an SEO strategy to give your business an online presence.

IDigital Marketing Services

How Are The Hours Used?

The management fees shown above covers the whole suite of BaseOne Digital's marketing services, and comes with the first month free as a revocable 'trial period'. The packages are available in 3 different tiers, with incremental access to more digital marketing services. The fee will pay for a certain amount of hours per month which can be allocated towards a wide variety of different marketing services. Together, we can decide on the best strategy to help your business expand online.

For example, if you wanted to focus on increasing your website's Google search engine rankings first then the majority of your available hours per month would go into SEO. Whereas, if you wanted to expand your reach on social media, your hours would be distributed into the creation of social media advertising campaigns. It's totally flexible towards your small business needs and goals.

To give you greater transparency, you'll receive a monthly report of the tasks that have been completed, along with the results from the previous month and the next steps for the following month. The retainer is charged on a monthly basis so you can cancel at anytime, I don't believe in getting tied down in long-drawn out contracts which means that the power is in your hands. Get in touch to see how I can help your business grow online.

Frequently Asked Questions

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="3.25" locked="off"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_toggle title="Why is SEO important to small businesses?" _builder_version="4.7.3" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||5%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)"]

If you are a small business, getting your brand name out there to local customers is essential in establishing your reputation. Often small businesses don't have large marketing budgets to spend on 'paid ads', which is why SEO lends itself to small businesses as it can be achieved organically through investment of time. 

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="How does SEO work?" _builder_version="4.7.3" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||4.9%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

SEO (Search Engine Optimisation) is the process of optimising your website to get organic traffic from search engine results pages. Through a combination of on-page (website content) and off-page (external to website), your website will be increasingly 'preffered' by search engines.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="Does 'Google My Business' help with SEO?" _builder_version="4.7.3" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||5.1%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

Simply put, yes it does - particuarly for local searches. It helps by providing social 'signals' to Google that your website is an estbalished entity in the proximity of the sercher. When combined with positive 5-star reviews from consumers and recent updates through the post feature, Google will know that your business is the best option to resolve the search query, thus pushing it up the rankings.

Nearly 46% of all google searches are seeking local informaiton. Because of this, Google understands the importnace of providing local search results. These reuslts are based on 3 factors; relevance (matching to the search intent), distnace (proximity of both parties) and prominence (brand reputation). Therefore, placing empahsis on your local listing can help with SEO in the long run.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="What SEO factors have the biggest impact?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||12%|" custom_margin_tablet="||0%||false|false" custom_margin_phone="||0%||false|false" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

There are a multitude of different SEO factors in determining your websites search ranking. The most important ones are listed below:

  • Having a secure website (SSL)
  • Optimised content
  • Mobile friendliness
  • Loading speed
  • Domain authority and age
  • The user experience (Bounce rates)
  • Technical SEO
  • Quality links (Outbound, inbound and internal)
  • Social signals (social shares)
  • Business information (register on google)
[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_toggle title="How does SEO help your business's website?" _builder_version="4.7.3" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||4.9%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)"]

Establishing a good SEO strategy is similar to the snowball effect. Once it starts to take place and pick up traffic overtime, it'll naturally increase in visibility as Google will start to recognise your website as a 'valid solution' to customer search queries and boost it's ranking positions.

This will drive more users to your website which could lead more sales for your business. However, the SEO game is always changing as Google frequently refresh their search ranking factors. Therefore, it pays to be up to date and stay on top your website's SEO.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="How to rank higher on google than competitors?" _builder_version="4.7.3" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||5.1%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

Establishing Google ranking territory in a competitive market place is like claiming land in the nomadic tribal days. Sometimes your competitors will just have a stronger hold over certain areas. However, similar to those times you can still come out victorious if you continously spot and exploit small gaps that your competitors haven't covered.

By utilising SEO research tools you'll be able to identify niche areas of your market that your competitors haven't tapped into. These are popular search queries that get a lot of traffic but don't have many relevant websites addressing that topic yet. Doing this continuously overtime will build up your website's authority on search engines, and soon you'll be ranking as high, if not, higher than your competitors.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="What are popular SEO tools you can use?" _builder_version="4.7.3" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||5.1%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

The best tool for the job depends on what the task is. For example, Keywordtool.io would give you loads of new keyword ideas for your webpages, but if you're looking for more a technical analysis of your website's performance then Google PageSpeed Insights would be your best choice. The main popular ones are listed below:

  •  Google PageSpeed Insights: Speed & Usability
  •  Keywordtool.io: Keyword ideas
  • Google Analytics: Overall Website Stats
  • Ahrefs' Backlink Checker: See Backlinks For Any Website
  • Google Trends: Popularity of Search Terms Overtime
[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="Will SEO die in 5 years?" _builder_version="4.7.3" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||12%|" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

This question has been consistently asked consistently by professionals over the past decades, but the truth is that no-one knows. What we do know is that right now 40,000 search queries performed every second, with many of them looking for a business to serve them a solution, therefore, it is absolutely crucial at the moment. 

There is no real reason why this trend shouldn't continue as Google will forever be updating their algorithms, therefore, optimising for the latest search ranking factors will always be necessary to capture your customers and generate sales. This is particularly important as business becomes more digital.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.25" locked="off"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.8.2" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" ul_font="||||||||" header_font="||||||||" header_2_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_2_font_size="45px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" header_3_font="||||||||" text_orientation="center" max_width="800px" max_width_last_edited="off|desktop" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="|||" custom_margin_tablet="|115px||" custom_margin_phone="|-100px||" custom_margin_last_edited="off|desktop" custom_padding="|||" header_2_font_size_tablet="35px" header_2_font_size_phone="28px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]

As a search engine optimisation company, BaseOne Digital offers SEO services and can provide the expertise to increase your website&#039;s google search ranking. This will give your business more visibility to potential customers and clients.

Why Copywriting Is Important To Your Small Business?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.0" _module_preset="default" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" text_orientation="center"]

Today, in this digital world, this is becoming increasingly more important as we have very few chances to interact with our customers on a personal basis and control the message we put across to them. Using well-written copy can capture your audience, retain interest and even boost conversions.

The copy on your website and adverts is the 'voice' that you deliver to your customers. Therefore, it is essential that this is done in a highly professional way as it feeds directly into the perception that they'll have for your company. 

Looking for a one off? I also offer that too, get in touch to discuss how I can help your brand with a copywriting project. 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.4" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="18px"]

Main Services Include:

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_3,1_3,1_3" _builder_version="4.7.4" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="0px|||||" locked="off"][et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="4.7.4" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" text_orientation="center"]
  • New website copy
  • Blog posts
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="4.7.4" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" text_orientation="center"]

  • Promotional material
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="4.7.4" _module_preset="default"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.4" _module_preset="default" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" text_orientation="center"]
  • Script for presentations
  • Sales emails

Copywriting Services

Copywriting For Adverts

The average attention is about 8 seconds long. It's declined by 4 seconds in the past 20 years. The reason? Many put this down to information overload and the amount of it we're exposed to everyday. For this reason, it's now absolutely vital that your copy is able to grab the readers attention, hold it, and then guide them to convert or enquire.

I provide copywriting services to create engaging text for your promotional and marketing activities.

text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" header_font="||||||||" header_2_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_2_font_size="35px" header_2_line_height="1.5em" header_3_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_3_font_size="35px" header_3_line_height="1.5em" header_4_font="Lato|700||on|||||" header_4_text_color="rgba(12,12,12,0.27)" header_4_font_size="16px" header_4_letter_spacing="3px" header_4_line_height="1.8em" header_3_font_size_tablet="" header_3_font_size_phone="25px" header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

Copywriting Services

Copywriting For Websites

First impressions do count. Your website's copy is the first thing your visitors will interact with when engaging with your business. The words and 'tone of voice' you choose will help them to form a perception of your business, which can be the difference between getting the sale and loosing it.

I can help your small business to establish your 'tone of voice' and convey your brand's message by working with you to write the text for your whole website. These copywriting services can be used to guide your visitors on their customer journey towards them getting in contact with your business.

Copywriting Services

Copywriting For Websites

First impressions do count. Your website's copy is the first thing your visitors will interact with when engaging with your business. The words and 'tone of voice' you choose will help them to form a perception of your business, which can be the difference between getting the sale and loosing it.

I can help your small business to establish your 'tone of voice' and convey your brand's message by working with you to write the text for your whole website. These copywriting services can be used to guide your visitors on their customer journey towards them getting in contact with your business.

Why Work With BaseOne Digital?

- 1 to 1 Support - Copywriting can be a very time consuming sometimes. That's why I take the time to understand what your business's goals are and how we can both work together to meet them.

- Flexible - As a small business owner your time is inevitably short, especially when you're balancing work with other aspects of your busy life. That's why it's more beneficial to work with a copywriting agency that is flexible enough to work around your schedule.

- Honesty - We've all heard the old saying, 'honesty is the best policy'. It's a tried and tested mantra, and that doesn't stop with copywriting agencies. Being transparent about pricing, information and knowledge is something I pride myelf on.

- Affordable -  BaseOne Digital is slightly different to other copyrighting agencies in Nottingham. It believes that copywriting services don't need to cost the earth. By working to a budget that's right for you, we can create excellent copy to attract the right users to your website for minimal expense.

IDigital Marketing Services

How Are The Hours Used?

The management fees shown above covers the whole suite of BaseOne Digital's marketing services, and comes with the first month free as a revocable 'trial period'. The packages are available in 3 different tiers, with incremental access to more digital marketing services. The fee will pay for a certain amount of hours per month which can be allocated towards a wide variety of different marketing services. Together, we can decide on the best strategy to help your business expand online.

For example, if you wanted to focus on increasing your website's Google search engine rankings first then the majority of your available hours per month would go into SEO. Whereas, if you wanted to expand your reach on social media, your hours would be distributed into the creation of social media advertising campaigns. It's totally flexible towards your small business needs and goals.

To give you greater transparency, you'll receive a monthly report of the tasks that have been completed, along with the results from the previous month and the next steps for the following month. The retainer is charged on a monthly basis so you can cancel at anytime, I don't believe in getting tied down in long-drawn out contracts which means that the power is in your hands. Get in touch to see how I can help your business grow online.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: BaseOne Digital can provide your business with a range of copywriting services. This includes copywriting for websites & marketing promotion.

Located in Nottingham, BaseOne Digital can provide your business with a range of copywriting services. This includes copywriting for websites, corporate documents, promotional marketing material and many more.

Why Is Social Media Management Important?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.0" _module_preset="default" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" text_orientation="center"]

In this digital world we live in, social media is an essential part of your business. Why? Because it's where your customers spend a large portion of their time every day. Businesses no longer have to spend loads of money on expensive television adverts in the hope it might reach some of their target customer base.

With a social media management company, you can make the most of feature such as location, demographic and interests targeting to get your products in front of your target audience for a low cost with incredible returns on investment. 

Looking for a one off? I also offer that too, get in touch to discuss how I can help your brand with a social media project.

Social media management Services

Facebook Ad Management Services

As a specialised Facebook ads agency, BaseOne Digital can help your small business reach your target customers directly on Facebook. Today, it's difficult to find anyone that isn't on Facebook so you can be assured that your customers are on there too.

The highly effective targeting system can identify your ideal customers based on their likes, age and location. The advantage of this is that you can choose to only show your adverts to customers that are likely to take action, it's much more cost effective than taking a 'broad approach' on a newspaper ad.

LinkedIn Ads Marketing

Is your business B2B? LinkedIn advertising is your best option. This is because LinkedIn allows you to target professionals based on their industry, company size and even their level of seniority. This means that you can put your products or services directly in front of the decision makers, without having to get past the proverbial 'gate keeper'.

I can manage the LinkedIn marketing for your business, and help you contact professionals appropriate for your business. If you're for more cost effecrive way to promote your business, marketing on LinkedIn is the choice for you.

Social media management Services

Social Media Content Management

Social media content is classed as imagery, post text, blogs or anything that would be shared on the major platforms. Getting the content right for your target market is vital to your brand's success, but it can be a drawn out case of trial and error. A lot of small businesses don't have time to test that many creatives.

That's why a social media content management agency would be beneficial for fast-tracking your brand to new heights. BaseOne Digital can create articles, social media posts and promotional videos for your business to help your social media following grow and build a loyal customer-base.

Why Work With BaseOne Digital?

- 1 to 1 Support - Social Media Management can be a jargon filled maze sometimes. That's why BaseOne Digital takes the time to understand what your business's goals are and how we can both work together to meet them.

- Flexible - As a small business owner your time is inevitably short, especially when you're balancing work with other aspects of your busy life. That's why it's more beneficial to work with a social media management company that is flexible enough to work around your schedule.

- Honesty - We've all heard the old saying, 'honesty is the best policy'. It's a tried and tested mantra, and that doesn't stop with this social media management company. Being transparent about pricing, information and knowledge is something BaseOne Digital prides itself on.

- Affordable -  BaseOne Digital is slightly different to a typical social media management company in Nottingham. It believes that a good social media content strategy doesn't need to cost the earth. By working to a budget that's right for you, we can develop an social media content strategy to help expand your business's reach and get in front of your target audience.

Digital Marketing Services

How Are The Hours Used?

The management fees shown above covers the whole suite of BaseOne Digital's marketing services, and comes with the first month free as a revocable 'trial period'. The packages are available in 3 different tiers, with incremental access to more digital marketing services. The fee will pay for a certain amount of hours per month which can be allocated towards a wide variety of different marketing services. Together, we can decide on the best strategy to help your business expand online.

For example, if you wanted to focus on increasing your website's Google search engine rankings first then the majority of your available hours per month would go into SEO. Whereas, if you wanted to expand your reach on social media, your hours would be distributed into the creation of social media advertising campaigns. It's totally flexible towards your small business needs and goals.

To give you greater transparency, you'll receive a monthly report of the tasks that have been completed, along with the results from the previous month and the next steps for the following month. The retainer is charged on a monthly basis so you can cancel at anytime, I don't believe in getting tied down in long-drawn out contracts which means that the power is in your hands. Get in touch to see how I can help your business grow online.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Social Media Management Company

Located in Nottingham, BaseOne Digital is a social media management company which specialises in the production of social content for small businesses. With a social media company, you can expand your reach, establish your brand name and drive traffic to your website.
 
Get in contactView Price list
Social Media Agency
Social Media Management Services

Why Is Social Media Management Important?
In this digital world we live in, social media is an essential part of your business. Why? Because it’s where your customers spend a large portion of their time every day. Businesses no longer have to spend loads of money on expensive television adverts in the hope it might reach some of their target customer base.
With a social media management company, you can make the most of feature such as location, demographic and interests targeting to get your products in front of your target audience for a low cost with incredible returns on investment. 
Looking for a one off? I also offer that too, get in touch to discuss how I can help your brand with a social media project. 

%

Of the UK population are active social media users

%

Use social media to research products

%

Of users engage on at least once a month

Whether your business is looking for a social media company to advertise on them for you, or just require an agency to manage them on a day to day level for you, I am here to work with you. 
Social media management Services
Facebook Ad Management Services
As a specialised Facebook ads agency, BaseOne Digital can help your small business reach your target customers directly on Facebook. Today, it’s difficult to find anyone that isn’t on Facebook so you can be assured that your customers are on there too.
The highly effective targeting system can identify your ideal customers based on their likes, age and location. The advantage of this is that you can choose to only show your adverts to customers that are likely to take action, it’s much more cost effective than taking a ‘broad approach’ on a newspaper ad.
Find out more
Social media management Services
Instagram Ads Management
Advertising on Instagram could boost traffic to your website and increase conversions. The image based platform allows businesses to show their more creative side and distribute engaging content directly to their target audience.
With over 2 billion active accounts, you can use Instagram ads to put your product or service right in front your customers for little expense. Instagram isn’t just for selfies, it’s a serious marketplace for businesses to gain real exposure. Instagram advertising could be an opportunity for you.
 
Social media management Services
Instagram Ads Management
Advertising on Instagram could boost traffic to your website and increase conversions. The image based platform allows businesses to show their more creative side and distribute engaging content directly to their target audience.
With over 2 billion active accounts, you can use Instagram ads to put your product or service right in front your customers for little expense. Instagram isn’t just for selfies, it’s a serious marketplace for businesses to gain real exposure. Instagram advertising could be an opportunity for you.
Social media management Services
LinkedIn Ads Marketing
Is your business B2B? LinkedIn advertising is your best option. This is because LinkedIn allows you to target professionals based on their industry, company size and even their level of seniority. This means that you can put your products or services directly in front of the decision makers, without having to get past the proverbial ‘gate keeper’.
I can manage the LinkedIn marketing for your business, and help you contact professionals appropriate for your business. If you’re for more cost effecrive way to promote your business, marketing on LinkedIn is the choice for you.
Social media management Services
Social Media Content Management
Social media content is classed as imagery, post text, blogs or anything that would be shared on the major platforms. Getting the content right for your target market is vital to your brand’s success, but it can be a drawn out case of trial and error. A lot of small businesses don’t have time to test that many creatives.
That’s why a social media content management agency would be beneficial for fast-tracking your brand to new heights. BaseOne Digital can create articles, social media posts and promotional videos for your business to help your social media following grow and build a loyal customer-base.
 
Social media management Services
Social Media Content Management
Social media content is classed as imagery, post text, blogs or anything that would be shared on the major platforms. Getting the content right for your target market is vital to your brand’s success, but it can be a drawn out case of trial and error. A lot of small businesses don’t have time to test that many creatives.
That’s why a social media content management agency would be beneficial for fast-tracking your brand to new heights. BaseOne Digital can create articles, social media posts and promotional videos for your business to help your social media following grow and build a loyal customer-base.
Why Work With BaseOne Digital?
– 1 to 1 Support – Social Media Management can be a jargon filled maze sometimes. That’s why BaseOne Digital takes the time to understand what your business’s goals are and how we can both work together to meet them.
– Flexible – As a small business owner your time is inevitably short, especially when you’re balancing work with other aspects of your busy life. That’s why it’s more beneficial to work with a social media management company that is flexible enough to work around your schedule.
– Honesty – We’ve all heard the old saying, ‘honesty is the best policy’. It’s a tried and tested mantra, and that doesn’t stop with this social media management company. Being transparent about pricing, information and knowledge is something BaseOne Digital prides itself on.
– Affordable –  BaseOne Digital is slightly different to a typical social media management company in Nottingham. It believes that a good social media content strategy doesn’t need to cost the earth. By working to a budget that’s right for you, we can develop an social media content strategy to help expand your business’s reach and get in front of your target audience.

Digital Marketing Services
How Are The Hours Used?
The management fees shown above covers the whole suite of BaseOne Digital’s marketing services, and comes with the first month free as a revocable ‘trial period’. The packages are available in 3 different tiers, with incremental access to more digital marketing services. The fee will pay for a certain amount of hours per month which can be allocated towards a wide variety of different marketing services. Together, we can decide on the best strategy to help your business expand online.
For example, if you wanted to focus on increasing your website’s Google search engine rankings first then the majority of your available hours per month would go into SEO. Whereas, if you wanted to expand your reach on social media, your hours would be distributed into the creation of social media advertising campaigns. It’s totally flexible towards your small business needs and goals.
To give you greater transparency, you’ll receive a monthly report of the tasks that have been completed, along with the results from the previous month and the next steps for the following month. The retainer is charged on a monthly basis so you can cancel at anytime, I don’t believe in getting tied down in long-drawn out contracts which means that the power is in your hands. Get in touch to see how I can help your business grow online.

Why Does Brand Design Matter?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.0" _module_preset="default" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" text_orientation="center"]

Having a strong brand design can help express the core values and message from your small business to the customer. This will allow them to form a perception of your company so they know what level of product quality and pricing they can expect.

Looking for a one off? I also offer that too, get in touch to discuss how I can help your small business with a brand design project.

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.4" _module_preset="default" text_font_size="18px" locked="off"]

Brand Design Services

Logo Design For Small Business

Having a good logo is essential for any business, and so it shouldn't be overlooked by small business. This is because it allows customers to be able to identify and recognise your brand, which is particularly important for retaining customer as the business starts to scale up.

All of the best logos in history have a few things in common; they are simple, clean and use distinct colours. Your brand should be instantly recognisable. As a brand design agency, BaseOne Digital can help you do just that.

Brand Design Services

Email Marketing For Small Business

Email marketing isn't dead, it's truly alive and kicking. With all the noise coming from social media, this is one way to contact your customers directly and form better relationships with them. Whether it's a sales promotion, an abandoned cart reminder or just a company update, an email marketing campaign can be an essential part of your brand's communications.

Email marketing carries significantly lower costs than other marketing channels as you can send out hundreds of emails instantly with just a click of a button. I can contact a mailing list of your customers with professional emails that carry your brand design, this can further develop your brand name and drive more traffic to your website.

Brand Design Services

Brand Designed Equipment

Despite the digital world we live in, people will always appreciate tangible branded items. This could include personalised business cards, company pens, notebooks, mugs and many more. The 'feel' of the item and it's quality says a lot about a company. For example, a well made business card or free pen can reflect the positive message that your small business is trying to portray.

Having your brand design printed on work equipment might seem menial to some, but having your branded item in their hands could potentially be the different between making the sale and loosing it. Make sure you don't miss out.

Why Work With BaseOne Digital?

- 1 to 1 Support - Brand design can be a jargon filled maze sometimes. That's why I take the time to understand what your business's goals are and how we can both work together to meet them.

- Flexible - As a small business owner your time is inevitably short, especially when you're balancing work with other aspects of your busy life. That's why it's more beneficial to work with a brand design agency that is flexible enough to work around your schedule.

- Honesty - We've all heard the old saying, 'honesty is the best policy'. It's a tried and tested mantra, and that doesn't stop with brand design companies. Being transparent about pricing, information and knowledge is something BaseOne Digital prides itself on.

- Affordable -  BaseOne Digital is slightly different to other brand design agencies in Nottingham. It believes that a good brand design doesn't need to cost the earth. By working to a budget that's right for you, we can design your brand to attract the right users to your website for minimal expense.

IDigital Marketing Services

How Are The Hours Used?

The management fees shown above covers the whole suite of BaseOne Digital's marketing services, and comes with the first month free as a revocable 'trial period'. The packages are available in 3 different tiers, with incremental access to more digital marketing services. The fee will pay for a certain amount of hours per month which can be allocated towards a wide variety of different marketing services. Together, we can decide on the best strategy to help your business expand online.

For example, if you wanted to focus on increasing your website's Google search engine rankings first then the majority of your available hours per month would go into SEO. Whereas, if you wanted to expand your reach on social media, your hours would be distributed into the creation of social media advertising campaigns. It's totally flexible towards your small business needs and goals.

To give you greater transparency, you'll receive a monthly report of the tasks that have been completed, along with the results from the previous month and the next steps for the following month. The retainer is charged on a monthly basis so you can cancel at anytime, I don't believe in getting tied down in long-drawn out contracts which means that the power is in your hands. Get in touch to see how I can help your business grow online.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Are you looking to further develop the brand for your small business? BaseOne Digital can help with the design and development of your brand.

Are you looking to further develop the brand for your small business? BaseOne Digital can help with the design and development of your brand, and get the right message out to more customers. Main Benefits Include: Logo design, Brand development, Managed email campaigns, Send to hundreds of people, Business card designs, Branded equipment

By working with a Google advertising agency, you can be sure that your campaigns will be set up in line with your objectives and in order to bring more traffic through to your website. The benefit of advertising on Google is that it allows to only show your adverts to people who are actually searching for what you offer.

Aside from the massive reach and increased traffic, this means that your website will receive more relevant users that are looking to buy products or services that you provide.  

Looking for a one off? I also offer that too, get in touch to discuss how I can help your brand with a google search ads project.

How Does Advertising On Google Work?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_tabs module_class="equal-tabs" _builder_version="4.7.4" _module_preset="default" body_font_size="16px" tab_font="Actor|700|||||||" tab_font_size="18px" module_alignment="left" custom_padding="||38px|||" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"][et_pb_tab title="1. Set Your Budget Bid" _builder_version="4.7.4" _module_preset="default"]

Google search works upon an auction format where advertisers will bid for the highest ranking positions. In order for your advert appear on Google search ads you'd need to set up a campaign and set a maximum daily budget for your bids along with keywords to bid for.

[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title="2. User Searches A Query" _builder_version="4.7.4" _module_preset="default"]

The auction would begin when the user types in a search term into Google, for example "local hairdressers". Google will then decide which advert is the best one to show the user from the available campaigns that have relevant keywords.

[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title="3. Google Ads Auction" _builder_version="4.7.4" _module_preset="default"]

To determine the order of adverts, Google uses a formula called AdRank. This is a combination of the advertisers 'Keyword Quality Score' and their bid. The Quality Score is based on ad relevance, expected click through rate of site and landing page experience.

[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title="4. Shows The Ad" _builder_version="4.7.4" _module_preset="default"]

Google will then display the ads to the user in the search results based on this formula in under a fraction of a second. It's worth noting that just being the highest doesn't guarantee a first place ranking as the Keyword Quality score is a major factor. That's why it's beneficial to work with an experience Google advertising agency, such as BaseOne Digital, to ensure that your ads are fully optimised.

Google Advertising Services

Google Ads For Small-to-Medium Sized Businesses

As a small business, getting your brand name out there can be difficult given all the excess noise in the marketing world today. That's where Google advertising comes in, it can allow you to you set your business apart from the competition by ranking above them in the search engine results pages.

By working with BaseOne Digital, an experienced Google advertising agency, you can have a ad campaign set up and ranking your website in no time.

Google Advertising services

How Much Does Google Advertising Cost?

The cost of Google Ads is worked out on a CPC (Cost Per Click) basis. This means that you will only get charged every time your advertisement is clicked on, not shown. Furthermore, the cost per click varies depending on the competitive nature of the keywords you're trying to rank for.

Prices often fall around £2.50 per click, but can exceed beyond that. Because of this, it's helpful to work with a Google advertising agency to ensure that your campaigns are optimised for the best ROI.

Why Work With BaseOne Digital?

- 1 to 1 Support - Google advertising can be a jargon filled maze sometimes. That's why BaseOne Digital takes the time to understand what your business's goals are and how we can both work together to meet them.

- Flexible - As a small business owner your time is inevitably short, especially when you're balancing work with other aspects of your busy life. That's why it's more beneficial to work with an Google advertising agency that is flexible enough to work around your schedule.

- Honesty - We've all heard the old saying, 'honesty is the best policy'. It's a tried and tested mantra, and that doesn't stop with Google advertising companies. Being transparent about pricing, information and knowledge is something BaseOne Digital prides itself on.

- Affordable -  BaseOne Digital is slightly different to other Google advertising agencies in Nottingham. It believes that a good Google Ads strategy doesn't need to cost the earth. By working to a budget that's right for you, we can develop an Google Ads strategy to attract the right users to your website for minimal expense.

IDigital Marketing Services

How Are The Hours Used?

The management fees shown above covers the whole suite of BaseOne Digital's marketing services, and comes with the first month free as a revocable 'trial period'. The packages are available in 3 different tiers, with incremental access to more digital marketing services. The fee will pay for a certain amount of hours per month which can be allocated towards a wide variety of different marketing services. Together, we can decide on the best strategy to help your business expand online.

For example, if you wanted to focus on increasing your website's Google search engine rankings first then the majority of your available hours per month would go into SEO. Whereas, if you wanted to expand your reach on social media, your hours would be distributed into the creation of social media advertising campaigns. It's totally flexible towards your small business needs and goals.

To give you greater transparency, you'll receive a monthly report of the tasks that have been completed, along with the results from the previous month and the next steps for the following month. The retainer is charged on a monthly basis so you can cancel at anytime, I don't believe in getting tied down in long-drawn out contracts which means that the power is in your hands. Get in touch to see how I can help your business grow online.

My opening hours are flexible to work around your busy work schedule. Given the time constraints placed on small business owners, I am happy to have meetings late into the evening - whichever time suits you!

 

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="FAQ" _builder_version="3.22"][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" ul_font="||||||||" header_font="||||||||" header_2_font="Roboto|700|||||||" header_2_font_size="45px" header_2_line_height="1.2em" header_3_font="Roboto|700|||||||" header_3_font_size="36px" header_3_line_height="1.2em" text_orientation="center" max_width="800px" max_width_last_edited="off|desktop" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="|||" custom_padding="|||" header_2_font_size_tablet="35px" header_2_font_size_phone="28px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]

Frequently Asked Questions

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" _builder_version="3.25" locked="off"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_toggle title="How do digital marketing agencies work?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||5%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)"]

The main goal of a digital marketing agency is to manage the digital marketing requirements of your small business. This includes your website, social media accounts, PR and many more. 

Apart from website design, a digital marketing can help you promote your brand through social media adverts, Google search ads and monthly written articles/ blog posts.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="What times do you operate?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||5.1%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

My operating times are Monday to Sunday 9am - 9pm. However, these aren't strict opening times as we're happy to have meetings and consultations beyond that until later on in the night. I understand that small businesses owners have to focus on their business during the weekday 9-5.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="What is your process for handling clients?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||12%|" custom_margin_tablet="||0%||false|false" custom_margin_phone="" custom_margin_last_edited="on|desktop" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

1. To begin with, I'd have a 'discovery meeting' with you which would allow us to understand each others goals from the projects and identify your design preferences. From this, you'd receive a 'sitemap' to give you an overview of the page structure.

2. After this step, I'd come back to you with some initial designs using 'placeholder images and text' to give you a good idea and 'feel' of what the website will look like once it's completed.

3. From this, I'd work with you to write the text and source the images for the website. I'd then ask you to review the site whilst I conduct tests on the site for bugs and functionally amendments.

4. Once all the final changes are made to the website, and you're happy, we can sign off the website as complete. From this point onwards, I'd maintain and manage the site for you in exchange for a monthly 'client retainer fee'.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="Upfront vs pay monthly packages" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||6.1%|||" custom_margin_tablet="||0%||false|false" custom_margin_phone="||0%||false|false" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

With my pay monthly packages everything is included, this means the design, build, hosting, domain renewals and unlimited content changes are all included.

With pay upfront you get everything you do as the pay monthly packages but only for the first 12 months. After this period there will be a monthly retainer fee to cover web hosting and maintenance.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_toggle title="What is your pricing structure?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||4.9%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)"]

The pricing structure depends entirely on what digital marketing service you require. As a cost basis, the hourly rate is £10 per hour, and so a simple website usually costs around £400 but will vary depending on the required work. However, this price can increase if a complex functionality is required or the site needs an online store. 

It's worth noting that no payment is required until you're happy with the website. Also I don't charge you for communication or consultations.

Once the website is complete, I will manage your website for you in exchange for a monthly 'client retainer fee' to cover the hosting and site maintenance costs.

The price for other digital marketing services will vary depending on the service.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="What makes BaseOne Digital different?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||5.1%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

BaseOne Digital isn't like other digital marketing agencies in Nottingham. I believe that a good website doesn't need to cost you the earth, instead, a high quality website can be achieved together with a reasonable budget.

What's more, l am available outside of the usual weekday 9-5 hours which means that if any issues occur during an awkward time, for example, during Friday night, you'll receive a quicker response than if you had to wait 2 whole days for the next working day. 

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="Will you manage my website for me?" _builder_version="4.7.4" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||12%|" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

I can design, build and manage your site for you. Unlike other agencies, you'll continue to receive 1-to-1 support on your websites post build completion. You can rest assure that I will manage updates and deliver server maintenance to your website, so you can focus on growing your business. 

I also offer content creation services such as blog/ article writing and social media posts to keep your website fresh and up to date with the latest news from your industry. This way you'd be able to provide more value to your user and establish your brand as the 'thought leader' in your market. 

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title="Am I tied into lengthy contracts?" _builder_version="4.8.2" title_font="Roboto|700|||||||" title_font_size="18px" title_line_height="1.7em" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="16px" body_line_height="2em" background_color="#ffffff" custom_margin="||8.1%|||" custom_padding="|30px||30px" animation_style="fold" animation_direction="top" border_radii="|||10px|10px" border_width_all="0px" box_shadow_style="preset1" box_shadow_blur="70px" box_shadow_color="rgba(110,130,208,0.18)" locked="off"]

My pay monthly website packages require a minimum term of 12 months. After this period it's a rolling monthly contract.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="3.22" background_color="#f5f6f9" background_image="https://baseonedigital.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/web-dev-24.png" parallax="on" custom_margin="|||" custom_padding="6vw||6vw||true" locked="off"][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.25"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.25" custom_padding="|||" custom_padding__hover="|||"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.6.6" text_font="||||||||" text_line_height="2em" header_font="||||||||" header_3_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_3_font_size="35px" header_3_line_height="1.5em" header_4_font="Lato|||on|||||" header_4_text_color="rgba(12,12,12,0.27)" header_4_font_size="16px" header_4_letter_spacing="3px" header_4_line_height="1.8em" text_orientation="center" max_width="700px" module_alignment="center" header_3_font_size_tablet="" header_3_font_size_phone="25px" header_3_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off"]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Form Submission Successful! Thank You, We'll Be In Touch Soon.

My opening hours are flexible to work around your busy work schedule. Given the time constraints placed on small business owners, I am happy to have meetings late into the evening – whichever time suits you!
 
Frequently Asked Questions
How do digital marketing agencies work?
The main goal of a digital marketing agency is to manage the digital marketing requirements of your small business. This includes your website, social media accounts, PR and many more. 
Apart from website design, a digital marketing can help you promote your brand through social media adverts, Google search ads and monthly written articles/ blog posts.
What times do you operate?
My operating times are Monday to Sunday 9am – 9pm. However, these aren’t strict opening times as we’re happy to have meetings and consultations beyond that until later on in the night. I understand that small businesses owners have to focus on their business during the weekday 9-5.
What is your process for handling clients?
1. To begin with, I’d have a ‘discovery meeting’ with you which would allow us to understand each others goals from the projects and identify your design preferences. From this, you’d receive a ‘sitemap’ to give you an overview of the page structure.
2. After this step, I’d come back to you with some initial designs using ‘placeholder images and text’ to give you a good idea and ‘feel’ of what the website will look like once it’s completed.
3. From this, I’d work with you to write the text and source the images for the website. I’d then ask you to review the site whilst I conduct tests on the site for bugs and functionally amendments.
4. Once all the final changes are made to the website, and you’re happy, we can sign off the website as complete. From this point onwards, I’d maintain and manage the site for you in exchange for a monthly ‘client retainer fee’.
Upfront vs pay monthly packages
With my pay monthly packages everything is included, this means the design, build, hosting, domain renewals and unlimited content changes are all included.
With pay upfront you get everything you do as the pay monthly packages but only for the first 12 months. After this period there will be a monthly retainer fee to cover web hosting and maintenance.
What is your pricing structure?
The pricing structure depends entirely on what digital marketing service you require. As a cost basis, the hourly rate is £10 per hour, and so a simple website usually costs around £400 but will vary depending on the required work. However, this price can increase if a complex functionality is required or the site needs an online store. 
It’s worth noting that no payment is required until you’re happy with the website. Also I don’t charge you for communication or consultations.
Once the website is complete, I will manage your website for you in exchange for a monthly ‘client retainer fee’ to cover the hosting and site maintenance costs.
The price for other digital marketing services will vary depending on the service.
What makes BaseOne Digital different?
BaseOne Digital isn’t like other digital marketing agencies in Nottingham. I believe that a good website doesn’t need to cost you the earth, instead, a high quality website can be achieved together with a reasonable budget.
What’s more, l am available outside of the usual weekday 9-5 hours which means that if any issues occur during an awkward time, for example, during Friday night, you’ll receive a quicker response than if you had to wait 2 whole days for the next working day. 
Will you manage my website for me?
I can design, build and manage your site for you. Unlike other agencies, you’ll continue to receive 1-to-1 support on your websites post build completion. You can rest assure that I will manage updates and deliver server maintenance to your website, so you can focus on growing your business. 
I also offer content creation services such as blog/ article writing and social media posts to keep your website fresh and up to date with the latest news from your industry. This way you’d be able to provide more value to your user and establish your brand as the ‘thought leader’ in your market. 
Am I tied into lengthy contracts?
My pay monthly website packages require a minimum term of 12 months. After this period it’s a rolling monthly contract.

Why Should You Use Facebook Ads For Your Business?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.7.0" _module_preset="default" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="2em" text_orientation="center"]

With over 2 billion active accounts, Facebook has one of the most biggest reaches of any social media platform out there. What's more, Facebook advertising platform allows you to show your adverts to customers based upon incredibly niche interests and behaviors, which results in a more effective use of your advertising budget.

This means that you can get your product or service in-front of your most relevant customers for a fraction of the cost of traditional advertising methods such as TV, Radio, and billboards.

Whether your business is looking for a Facebook ads agency to advertise on them for you, or just require an agency to manage them on a day to day level for you, I am here to work with you.

Facebook Ads Agency Services

As a specialised Facebook ads agency, BaseOne Digital can help your small business reach your target customers directly on Facebook. Today, it's difficult to find anyone that isn't on Facebook so you can be assured that your customers are on there too.

Why Work With BaseOne Digital?

- 1 to 1 Support - Facebook Ads can be a jargon filled maze sometimes. That's why I take the time to understand what your business's goals are and how we can both work together to meet them.

- Flexible - As a small business owner your time is inevitably short, especially when you're balancing work with other aspects of your busy life. That's why it's more beneficial to work with a Facebook Ads Agency that is flexible enough to work around your schedule.

- Honesty - We've all heard the old saying, 'honesty is the best policy'. It's a tried and tested mantra, and that doesn't stop with this social media management company. Being transparent about pricing, information and knowledge is something I pride myself on.

- Affordable -  BaseOne Digital is slightly different to a typical Facebook Ads Agency in Nottingham. It believes that a good social media content strategy doesn't need to cost the earth. By working to a budget that's right for you, we can develop an social media content strategy to help expand your business's reach and get in front of your target audience.
